original: lha'i spyan ni gzugs dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i spyan ni gzugs dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'o //
translated: With the divine eye, they see the death and rebirth of all sentient beings.

original: shes rab kyi spyan gyis don dam par chos thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa dang / kun rdzob tu ni thams cad rjes su dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi spyan gyis don dam par chos thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa dang / kun rdzob tu ni thams cad rjes su dmigs pa'o //
translated: With the wisdom eye, they do not apprehend any phenomena ultimately, and they apprehend everything conventionally.

original: chos kyi spyan gyis ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gis gang rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi spyan gyis ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gis gang rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o //
translated: The eye of Dharma is the correct seeing of what is realized by ƒÅrya beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa ni spyan lnga la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa ni spyan lnga la gdams pa'o //
translated: The eye of buddhahood is the complete knowledge of all phenomena in all their aspects.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang zag pa zad par shes pa zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa drug ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang zag pa zad par shes pa zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa drug ste /
translated: The six kinds of preternatural knowledge are the preternatural knowledge of magical powers, the divine eye, the divine ear, knowledge of others‚Äô minds, recollection of past lives, and knowledge of the extinction of defilements.

original: lha'i mig gis mngon par shes pas ni sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mngon par shes pas ni sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa ste /
translated: The preternatural knowledge of the divine eye is the knowledge of the deaths and births of sentient beings.

original: 'di ni mngon par 'du byas pa'i sngon gyi lha'i mig gi rnam par smin pa las byung ba can la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang zag pa zad pa'i ye shes ni sa brgyad pa nas brtsams te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par 'du byas pa'i sngon gyi lha'i mig gi rnam par smin pa las byung ba can la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang zag pa zad pa'i ye shes ni sa brgyad pa nas brtsams te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: This is the divine eye that results from the maturation of previous karma. The eye of buddhahood and the knowledge of the extinction of defilements arise from the eighth level onward.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni /üîΩyid kyi blo bzhin du dbang pos rtogs par bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yul @20a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni / yid kyi blo bzhin du dbang pos rtogs par bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yul @20a * //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn asserts:

original: yongs su gcod pas rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi yul du thams cad 'dod do //
analyzed: yongs su gcod pas rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi yul du thams cad 'dod do //
translated: All objects are asserted as objects of all consciousnesses, since they are objects of mental consciousness and are objects of the sense consciousnesses such as eye consciousness.

original: ji skad du dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: ji skad du dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las /
translated: As the S≈´tra on Generating the Power of Faith says:

original: de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the tathƒÅgatas see in the same way with their u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a.üîΩThey see in the same way with each of their ≈´r·πáƒÅ hairs and each of their major marks.

original: de bzhin du mdzod spu dang mtshan re res kyang gzigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdzod spu dang mtshan re res kyang gzigs so //
translated: They see in the same way with each of their pores.üîΩIn the same way, they see the entire world system of a billion worlds in the ten directions at one time.

original: de bzhin du dus gcig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnam pa thams cad mthong zhes gsungs pa de ltar na yang dbang po'i blo ni sngon gyi rjes su 'brang nas rnam par gzhag par bya zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa drug la gdams
analyzed: de bzhin du dus gcig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnam pa thams cad mthong zhes gsungs pa de ltar na yang dbang po'i blo ni sngon gyi rjes su 'brang nas rnam par gzhag par bya zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa drug la gdams
translated: In this way, the mental consciousness is posited as following after the prior sense consciousnesses.

original: pa'o // de nyid kyis sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par yongs su brtags pa'i lhag mthong dag mngon du byas nas /
analyzed: pa'o // de nyid kyis sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par yongs su brtags pa'i lhag mthong dag mngon du byas nas /
translated: By that very [means], having actualized the insight that thoroughly investigates all phenomena as essenceless in the samadhi of accomplishment,

original: de yongs su smin nas lhun gyis grub pa'i spros pa med pa'i dbyings su sems pa yang dag par 'jog nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de ltar gang yang ma mthong ba'i don des mthong ngo zhes pa ni mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su smin nas lhun gyis grub pa'i spros pa med pa'i dbyings su sems pa yang dag par 'jog nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de ltar gang yang ma mthong ba'i don des mthong ngo zhes pa ni mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa'o //
translated: when that [insight] ripens, having settled in the spontaneous, unelaborated expanse, with supramundane wisdom, one sees the meaning of not seeing anything at all. This is the instruction on the path of seeing.

original: gang du mthong ba'i kho na'i rgyun gyi ye shes des bsgom par bya ba zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la gdams pa ste /
analyzed: gang du mthong ba'i kho na'i rgyun gyi ye shes des bsgom par bya ba zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la gdams pa ste /
translated: The wisdom that is the continuity of just that seeing, that is to be cultivated, is the instruction on the path of cultivation.

original: de nyid mi dmigs pa'i rnam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sgrub pa la dmigs pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / rten skyabs rigs pa dang / zhen pa med pa dang / yongs su mi ngal ba dang /
analyzed: de nyid mi dmigs pa'i rnam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sgrub pa la dmigs pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / rten skyabs rigs pa dang / zhen pa med pa dang / yongs su mi ngal ba dang /
translated: By that very [means], one practices the perfection of wisdom through the aspect of non-observation, and one observes the accomplishment, the knowledge of the truths, the reasoning of the refuge lineage, non-attachment, non-exhaustion,

original: phyogs bcur lta dgongs kyang des 'dir theg pa gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rgyur lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / spyan lnga dang / gzhan mngon par shes pa drug dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'phags pa'i sa rnams la kun tu spyod do //
analyzed: phyogs bcur lta dgongs kyang des 'dir theg pa gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rgyur lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / spyan lnga dang / gzhan mngon par shes pa drug dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'phags pa'i sa rnams la kun tu spyod do //
translated: The five eyes, the other six higher perceptions, and the ƒÅrya stages of the path of seeing and the path of meditation are completely practiced.

original: zhes pa ni 'dir gdams ngag rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir gdams ngag rim pa'o //
translated: Here, the stages of instruction are as follows.

original: 'dir tshogs kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos nyan cing gzhung dang don dag 'dzin pa rnams la bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: 'dir tshogs kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos nyan cing gzhung dang don dag 'dzin pa rnams la bsam gtan dang /
translated: Here, a bodhisattva who is abiding on the stage of accumulation, having obtained the samƒÅdhi of the stream of Dharma, while sitting on a single seat, listens to the Dharma from buddhas and bodhisattvas and retains the texts and meanings.

original: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su de 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su de 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: Having accomplished the meditative concentrations and higher perceptions, he goes to the worldly realms.

original: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rnams //
translated: The buddhas are immeasurable.

original: mchod pa'i don dang gzhan don du //
analyzed: mchod pa'i don dang gzhan don du //
translated: For the purpose of making offerings and for the benefit of others,

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / de'i @20b rjes la /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / de'i @20b rjes la /
translated: And after that,

original: gdams ngag gis bstan mngon shes kyis //
analyzed: gdams ngag gis bstan mngon shes kyis //
translated: The instructions and the higher perceptions

original: spyod pa'i sa la rab tu 'jug / ces pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa'i sa la rab tu 'jug / ces pa ste /
translated: Enter into the stage of action.

original: sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i mthong ba'i lam 'byed cing so sor phye nas mngon sum du byed pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha shas des rten cing thob pa des na nges par 'byed pa'iüîΩyan lag ste /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i mthong ba'i lam 'byed cing so sor phye nas mngon sum du byed pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha shas des rten cing thob pa des na nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ste /
translated: The virtue of the fourfold generation of the will, which is conducive to penetration, opens up the non-conceptual path of seeing, and by the part of penetration which discerns and makes manifest, one attains the support of the path of seeing.üîΩTherefore, it is called the limb of penetration.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ni rgyu'o //
translated: The limb of penetration is the cause.

original: yang na nges par 'byed pa ni nges pa la de'i yan lag ni cha shas te /
analyzed: yang na nges par 'byed pa ni nges pa la de'i yan lag ni cha shas te /
translated: Or, penetration is certainty, and its limb is a part.

original: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po nyid kyis rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po nyid kyis rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: It is fourfold by the small, medium, great, and greater-than-great.

original: de la drod ni shing gtsubs pa'i me bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me'i snga rtags so //
analyzed: de la drod ni shing gtsubs pa'i me bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me'i snga rtags so //
translated: The heat is the prior sign of the fire of supramundane wisdom, like the heat of rubbing sticks.

original: rtse mo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mi g-yo ba'i phyir rtse mo'o //
analyzed: rtse mo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mi g-yo ba'i phyir rtse mo'o //
translated: The peak is so called because the roots of virtue are unshakable.

original: bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la mos pa brtan pos bzod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la mos pa brtan pos bzod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Acceptance is so called because one is firmly convinced of the nonarising of dharmas.

original: chos kyi mchog ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi mchog ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme mundane state is so called because it is the supreme mundane state.

original: yang drod la sogs pa ni so sor chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis na rab tu dbye ba bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: yang drod la sogs pa ni so sor chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis na rab tu dbye ba bcu gnyis te /
translated: Moreover, heat and so on are divided into twelve by means of their lesser, middling, and greater aspects.

original: gang du skad cig ma gcig pa nyid du chos mchog ces bshad pa ni de rang don gyi skabs pas nyan thos rnams kyi la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni min te /
analyzed: gang du skad cig ma gcig pa nyid du chos mchog ces bshad pa ni de rang don gyi skabs pas nyan thos rnams kyi la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni min te /
translated: The supreme mundane state is explained as being a single moment. That is in the context of the disciples, not in the context of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag gi ni gzhan gyi don ni de srid du de gnas par byed pa srid ces pa ni des na de dang 'di la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de dag gi ni gzhan gyi don ni de srid du de gnas par byed pa srid ces pa ni des na de dang 'di la 'gal ba med do //
translated: The bodhisattvas remain for as long as it takes to accomplish the welfare of others. Therefore there is no contradiction here.

original: de yang drod la sogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yod do //
analyzed: de yang drod la sogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yod do //
translated: Moreover, heat and so on also exist for the disciples and the self-realized ones.

original: bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug ni bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir la /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug ni bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir la /
translated: The sixteen aspects such as impermanence that focus on the four noble truths are antidotes to the view of self.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni de rnams la khyad par du 'phags pa ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni de rnams la khyad par du 'phags pa ste //
translated: But for bodhisattvas, they are superior.

original: chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir ro //
translated: They are antidotes to the view of phenomena.

original: de ltar bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos las /
translated: Thus the treatise Attainment of Knowledge states:üîΩBecause of their focal object, aspect,

original: dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang // rgyu phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang // rgyu phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yi //
translated: and cause, they are fully grasped.

original: rnam rtog bzhi po dang ldan pas //
analyzed: rnam rtog bzhi po dang ldan pas //
translated: Because of these four misconceptions,

original: ji ltar rang gi rten bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi rten bzhin du //
translated: they are like their own support.

original: nyan thos bse ru bcas pa las //
analyzed: nyan thos bse ru bcas pa las //
translated: For the listeners and solitary realizers,

original: byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi //üîΩchung ngu 'bring dang mchog rnams kyi //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi // chung ngu 'bring dang mchog rnams kyi //
translated: the bodhisattvas are the protectors.üîΩThe heat and so forth of the bodhisattvas

original: drod sogs rnams ni khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: drod sogs rnams ni khyad par 'phags //
translated: are superior in terms of their lesser, middling and best.

original: zhes so // sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa can gyi phyir skyob pa ni byang chub sems @21a * //
analyzed: zhes so // sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa can gyi phyir skyob pa ni byang chub sems @21a * //
translated: Because they have the intention to protect all sentient beings, the bodhisattvas are the protectors.

original: dpa' ste / de rnams kyi drod la sogs pa rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid de /
analyzed: dpa' ste / de rnams kyi drod la sogs pa rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid de /
translated: They are heroes because they are superior to the sravakas and so on.üîΩThey are superior to the sravakas and so on in terms of heat and so on because they possess five special attributes:

original: dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / rgyu'i phyir dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa bzhi po dang ldan pas ji ltar rang gi zhes pa'i khyad par rnam pa lnga rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / rgyu'i phyir dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa bzhi po dang ldan pas ji ltar rang gi zhes pa'i khyad par rnam pa lnga rnams kyis so //
translated: object, aspect, cause, possession and conception.

original: rnam par rtog pa bzhi yod kyang nyan thos la sogs pa la ni rang gi byang chub kyi lam dang mi mthun pa med pas rnam par gzhag pa ma byas so //üîΩde la drod chung ngu ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bzhi yod kyang nyan thos la sogs pa la ni rang gi byang chub kyi lam dang mi mthun pa med pas rnam par gzhag pa ma byas so // de la drod chung ngu ni /
translated: Although the sravakas and so on have the four conceptions, they do not establish the four heat and so on because they do not possess the five special attributes.üîΩThe Abhidharmako≈õa states that the four heat and so on are:

original: dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa //
analyzed: dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa //
translated: Heat has the aspects of impermanence and so on

original: bden pa'i rten can de byed pa'i //üîΩrnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog / ces bstan bcos las te /
analyzed: bden pa'i rten can de byed pa'i //üîΩrnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog / ces bstan bcos las te /
translated: and is the forerunner of the supreme dharma.üîΩIt is the supreme mundane state that is preceded by heat.

original: bden pa bzhi'i yul gyi mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug la dmigs pa des dmigs pa rnam pa so sor mngon par zhen pa med pas mi gnas pa dang 'du shes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa bzhi'i yul gyi mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug la dmigs pa des dmigs pa rnam pa so sor mngon par zhen pa med pas mi gnas pa dang 'du shes pa med pa'o //
translated: The sixteen aspects of the objects of the four truths, such as impermanence, are the objective supports. The non-abiding and non-perception are due to the absence of attachment to the individual aspects of the objective supports.

original: 'dir chen po ni dngos por 'dzin pa nyid la /
analyzed: 'dir chen po ni dngos por 'dzin pa nyid la /
translated: Here, the great is the grasping at things.

original: 'bring ni mngon par zhen pas gnas pa chung ngu ni 'du shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'bring ni mngon par zhen pas gnas pa chung ngu ni 'du shes pa'o //
translated: The medium is the abiding through attachment. The small is the perception.üîΩThe non-attachment to the perfection of wisdom is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths.üîΩThe non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-perception is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhen pa ni bden pa dang 'brel pa can gyi mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par zhen pa med pa la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pa byas la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i ye shesüîΩspyod pas so //üîΩmnyam par bzhag pas ni sgom zhes te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhen pa ni bden pa dang 'brel pa can gyi mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par zhen pa med pa la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pa byas la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i ye shes spyod pas so // mnyam par bzhag pas ni sgom zhes te /
translated: The non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-perception is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-perception is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-perception is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.üîΩThe non-perception is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence, which are related to the truths and are not related to the truths.

original: des nye bar dmigs pa med pa la de ltar dmigs pa'i rnam pa ni rlom pa med pa'o //üîΩde ltar zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: des nye bar dmigs pa med pa la de ltar dmigs pa'i rnam pa ni rlom pa med pa'o //üîΩde ltar zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas so //
translated: The non-abiding is the non-attachment to the aspects of the objective supports, such as impermanence

original: des kyang zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa 'ba' zhig gis min te des nye bar dmigs nas rlom sems med pa ste /
analyzed: des kyang zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa 'ba' zhig gis min te des nye bar dmigs nas rlom sems med pa ste /
translated: Also means not only by the lack of entityness, but also by the lack of conceit upon observing that.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pas rgyun chad pa med pas sems can gyi don gyi bya ba mngon par zhen pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos su 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'i shes pas kyang rlom sems med pa ste /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pas rgyun chad pa med pas sems can gyi don gyi bya ba mngon par zhen pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos su 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'i shes pas kyang rlom sems med pa ste /
translated: Since it is not shared with ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on, it is uninterrupted. The knowledge that is the antidote to apprehending phenomena that has the nature of non-attachment to the performance of the welfare of sentient beings is also without conceit.

original: mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not cause attachment.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i yod pa dang med par 'dzin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag de nyid du med ces pa'i shes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i yod pa dang med par 'dzin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag de nyid du med ces pa'i shes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: The knowledge that the discordant classes of the apprehensions of existence and nonexistence, which are motivated by incorrect conception, do not exist in reality is the antidote.

original: de zhes pa ni rlom pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni rlom pa med pa'o //
translated: That is the lack of conceit.

original: de ci zhes pa ni ci'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ci zhes pa ni ci'i phyir te /
translated: What is that? means why?

original: gtan tshigs de tshad ma'i phyir @21b ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de tshad ma'i phyir @21b ro //
translated: Because that reason is valid.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / gnod par byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / gnod par byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because there is no valid cognition to prove it, and because it is possible to invalidate it.

original: sems de ni sems ma mchis zhes pa ni sems de don dam par yod pa min zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sems de ni sems ma mchis zhes pa ni sems de don dam par yod pa min zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That mind is not a mind means that that mind does not exist ultimately.

original: 'o na sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na sems te /üîΩde yang sngon po la sogs pa la gsal bar byed pas don dam par so sor rang rig pas mngon sum gyis grub ces pa ni ji lta ba'i de kho na nyid min pa'i rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rig pa la ji lta ba bzhin rig par
analyzed: 'o na sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na sems te / de yang sngon po la sogs pa la gsal bar byed pas don dam par so sor rang rig pas mngon sum gyis grub ces pa ni ji lta ba'i de kho na nyid min pa'i rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rig pa la ji lta ba bzhin rig par
translated: Well then, the essence of the features of blue and so on is the mind itself.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And since that mind is the illuminator of blue and so on, it is ultimately established by the direct perception of reflexive awareness, which is the claim of those who assert that reflexive awareness is the knower of things as they are.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i gnyis su med par 'dod pa de ni min te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i gnyis su med par 'dod pa de ni min te /
translated: Therefore, your assertion that the nondual mind is free from apprehended and apprehender is not so.

original: gnyis su rig pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnyis su rig pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is cognized as dual.

original: rnam par chad pa'i sngon po la sogs pa phyi rol du des nges par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa ni sems pa ma sbyangs pa'i tha snyad rnams kyi byis pa rnams kyis kyang gsal bar gnyis su med pa na gnyis su med pa'i 'khrul pa
analyzed: rnam par chad pa'i sngon po la sogs pa phyi rol du des nges par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa ni sems pa ma sbyangs pa'i tha snyad rnams kyi byis pa rnams kyis kyang gsal bar gnyis su med pa na gnyis su med pa'i 'khrul pa
translated: The non-conceptual cognition of external blue, etc., which is discontinuous, is clearly non-dual, even for the childish who are not trained in the conventions of thought.

original: 'di ni gnyis su med pas bskyed pa ste rig par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ni gnyis su med pas bskyed pa ste rig par 'gyur la /
translated: This non-duality is produced by non-duality, and is known.

original: rnam par shes pa gcig gnyis kyi ngo bo yang min te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gcig gnyis kyi ngo bo yang min te /
translated: And consciousness is not the nature of both,

original: gnyis dang gnyis med pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis med pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because duality and non-duality are mutually exclusive.

original: de nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa mi 'thad cing gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i 'khrul pa 'di ni gnyis su med pas bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: de nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa mi 'thad cing gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i 'khrul pa 'di ni gnyis su med pas bskyed pa ste /
translated: Then, the apprehended and apprehender are not tenable, and non-duality is produced by non-duality.

original: de bskyed pas gnyis su med pa yang 'khrul la /
analyzed: de bskyed pas gnyis su med pa yang 'khrul la /
translated: Since it is produced, non-duality is also deluded.

original: de nyid kyis na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ni khams gsum pa can gyi'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ni khams gsum pa can gyi'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: By that very fact, the mind and mental factors of unreal imagination belong to the three realms.

original: phyi rol gyi sngon po'o zhes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang rig pa'i bya ba yid la thog ma med pa nas 'jug pa dbang po'i shes pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'jug cing gcig tu ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya zhe na min te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi sngon po'o zhes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang rig pa'i bya ba yid la thog ma med pa nas 'jug pa dbang po'i shes pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'jug cing gcig tu ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya zhe na min te /
translated: If you say that the activity of reflexive awareness of the thought ‚Äúexternal blue‚Äù has operated from beginningless time, it follows the activity of sense consciousness and naturally occurs as one, we say:

original: 'khrul pa yang rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa yang rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ste /
translated: Even error is ultimately reflexive awareness.

original: gnyis su med pas phyi rol du dmigs par 'gyur bas de'i 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas gsal ba'i cha ni rang gi snang ba'i cha la dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis su med pas phyi rol du dmigs par 'gyur bas de'i 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas gsal ba'i cha ni rang gi snang ba'i cha la dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Since it is nondual, it is not the case that the aspect of clarity of the conception of the object of your desire is the observation of its own appearing aspect.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis gsal ba thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa'i phyir na gzhan gyi phyi rol des nges pa ma yin te /üîΩphyi rol gyi gsal ba'i mngon sum med de de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing sgra don ni gsal bar mngon sum du @22a * //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis gsal ba thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa'i phyir na gzhan gyi phyi rol des nges pa ma yin te / phyi rol gyi gsal ba'i mngon sum med de de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing sgra don ni gsal bar mngon sum du @22a * //
translated: Since all that is intrinsically clear is conceptual, it is not ascertained by another external object.

original: dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: External clarity is not direct perception, and thus it is not realized. The meaning of the term is not observed as clear direct perception.

original: bdag med pas gsal bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bdag med pas gsal bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the self is not clear, the self is not the clear light.

original: bdag nyid gsal ba nyid na bdag med pa gsal ba yang yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid gsal ba nyid na bdag med pa gsal ba yang yin te /
translated: If the self were clear, the self would be clear light.

original: smig rgyur gsal ba nyid la chur gsal ba med do //
analyzed: smig rgyur gsal ba nyid la chur gsal ba med do //
translated: But when a mirage is clear, water is not clear.

original: de nyid kyis na mdo sde pa'i 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i phyi rol gyi don med de /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mdo sde pa'i 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i phyi rol gyi don med de /
translated: Therefore, the assertion of the Sautrantikas that external objects exist for the world is not correct.

original: sngon po la sogs pa rig pa nyid kyis rig par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa rig pa nyid kyis rig par mi 'thad do //
translated: It is not tenable that consciousness is aware of blue and so on.

original: des na 'jig rten pa'i sngon po la sogs pa las rtog par lkog tu gyur pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa yang med la med pas na rmi lam la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: des na 'jig rten pa'i sngon po la sogs pa las rtog par lkog tu gyur pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa yang med la med pas na rmi lam la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that the world conceives of external objects such as blue, which are hidden from it, through positive and negative concomitance.

original: de'i rigs mthun pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de'i rigs mthun pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since it is possible that a reason similar to that could apply to dreams and so on,

original: rang gis rig pa ni don rig pa'i 'bras bus blta bar bya zhes pa ni shin tu yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: rang gis rig pa ni don rig pa'i 'bras bus blta bar bya zhes pa ni shin tu yang mi 'thad de /
translated: it is utterly untenable to say that reflexive awareness is perceived by the result of the awareness of objects.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo la rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi ngo bo nyid mi 'grub la /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo la rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi ngo bo nyid mi 'grub la /
translated: The wheel of aspects such as blue is not established as the essence of reflexive awareness.

original: 'bras bu mi dmigs pas dmigs pa nyid skyed par zhes pa'i dam pa ma yin pa 'di ni mdo sde pa'i 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi dmigs pas dmigs pa nyid skyed par zhes pa'i dam pa ma yin pa 'di ni mdo sde pa'i 'dod pa'o //
translated: This is the assertion of the Sautrantikas.

original: de nas sna tshogs pa ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la ma rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyis rnam par brtags pas phyi rol ma yin pa la phyi rol du song nas skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de nas sna tshogs pa ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la ma rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyis rnam par brtags pas phyi rol ma yin pa la phyi rol du song nas skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Then, if it is said that the variety arises in mere representation itself, since it is imagined by ignorance, not being external, it goes to externality,

original: min te / rang rig pa tsam la ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan la brten pa'i ma rig pa nyid kyang med do //
analyzed: min te / rang rig pa tsam la ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan la brten pa'i ma rig pa nyid kyang med do //
translated: no, because in mere self-awareness, ignorance based on other conceptualization does not exist.

original: de nas mi 'dzin kyang gzhan du 'jug pa'i skyed pa por dmigs na /
analyzed: de nas mi 'dzin kyang gzhan du 'jug pa'i skyed pa por dmigs na /
translated: Then, if it is observed that it is the producer of engagement with other, even though it is not grasped,

original: de lta na yang rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gang gis nye bar skyed par byed pa med pa nyid kyis phyi rol 'di nyid zhes pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i ngo bo'i don gyi bya bas dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rgyun gyis byed la
analyzed: de lta na yang rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gang gis nye bar skyed par byed pa med pa nyid kyis phyi rol 'di nyid zhes pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i ngo bo'i don gyi bya bas dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rgyun gyis byed la
translated: in that case also, since there is no production by any aspect of conceptualization, this externality is just an object of observation, etc. The meaning of the action of the nature of observation is done by the continuum of memory, desire, and so on.

original: / de las don gyi bya ba don du gnyer bas phyi rol gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa la zhugs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi bya ba thob pa ni gzhan du na dpyad mi dgos te /
analyzed: / de las don gyi bya ba don du gnyer bas phyi rol gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa la zhugs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi bya ba thob pa ni gzhan du na dpyad mi dgos te /
translated: Since the purpose of that is the pursuit of the activity of the object, one engages in what is in accord with external objects. The attainment of the activity of the object that is desired is not necessary elsewhere.

original: 'di ltar yang gzhan gyi phyi rol gyi rig pa med pa la des khyad par can du rab tu 'jug pa'i nges pa skyed pa po nyid kyi rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang gzhan gyi phyi rol gyi rig pa med pa la des khyad par can du rab tu 'jug pa'i nges pa skyed pa po nyid kyi rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mi srid do //
translated: Thus, in the absence of external cognition, the arising of the ascertainment that engages in the distinctive is impossible without the ultimate reflexive awareness.

original: dmigs pa la sogs pa la yang rang rig mthar thug pa 'di'o zhes 'jug pa'i ngo bo med la dmigs pa med pas phyi rol gyi 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i sgro btags kyi mngon par rlom pas 'dzin pa la 'dzin pa nye bar btags @22b pa'i the
analyzed: dmigs pa la sogs pa la yang rang rig mthar thug pa 'di'o zhes 'jug pa'i ngo bo med la dmigs pa med pas phyi rol gyi 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i sgro btags kyi mngon par rlom pas 'dzin pa la 'dzin pa nye bar btags @22b pa'i the
translated: In the case of the object and so on, there is no engagement in the nature of the ultimate reflexive awareness. Since there is no object, the superimposition of the external conceptual error is apprehended by the conceit of the apprehension that is designated as theüîΩdoubt and ascertainment that are imputed.

original: tshom dang nges pa dag tu mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par btags na kha phyir phyogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: tshom dang nges pa dag tu mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par btags na kha phyir phyogs pa nyid de /
translated: When imputed, they are only directed outward.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo rang gi ngo bo la rab tu bsgribs nas phyi rol dang gcig tu byed pa la sogs pa'i sgra la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba ni dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba la rang rig pa tsam du chud pa nyid ce na niüîΩ/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa'i ma rig pa'i 'khor ba'i gang de med pas gnyis su med pas gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid la 'bad mi dgos par mngon sum du byas zhes pas sems can rnams thams cad rtag tu de ltar grol ba'i sangs
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo rang gi ngo bo la rab tu bsgribs nas phyi rol dang gcig tu byed pa la sogs pa'i sgra la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba ni dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba la rang rig pa tsam du chud pa nyid ce na ni / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa'i ma rig pa'i 'khor ba'i gang de med pas gnyis su med pas gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid la 'bad mi dgos par mngon sum du byas zhes pas sems can rnams thams cad rtag tu de ltar grol ba'i sangs
translated: If you say that the reason for engaging in terms is the division of the objects of reference, which is the obscuration of the nature of other by the nature of self, making them one with the external, and so on,üîΩthen since there is no samsara of the ignorance of the error of apprehended and apprehender, the nondual reality is actualized without the need for effort.

original: rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore all sentient beings would always be liberated and become buddhas.

original: gang yang gzhan la ltos te blo mi gsal ba'i 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa du ma ni rang gi ngo bor ni thams cad mi 'khrul par gzhan gyi ngo bor ni phyin ci log tu 'gyur ces khyod kyis 'dod na /
analyzed: gang yang gzhan la ltos te blo mi gsal ba'i 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa du ma ni rang gi ngo bor ni thams cad mi 'khrul par gzhan gyi ngo bor ni phyin ci log tu 'gyur ces khyod kyis 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the many conceptual thoughts of error, which are unclear cognitions in dependence on other, are all nonerroneous in terms of their nature but are erroneous in terms of other,

original: gzhan gyi dang so sor snang ba la dmigs pa dag ni mi sbyor te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dang so sor snang ba la dmigs pa dag ni mi sbyor te /
translated: But the other, which has the appearance of each individual thing as its object, is not so connected.

original: mi gsal bar nges pa'i phyin ci log gi the tshom nges pa phyi rol du mngon par 'dod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la zhugs pas sgra don gyi rnam pa yod pa bkag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad rgyun chadüîΩpar 'gyur ro //üîΩ'on te 'khrul ba dang ni ma 'khrul pa //
analyzed: mi gsal bar nges pa'i phyin ci log gi the tshom nges pa phyi rol du mngon par 'dod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la zhugs pas sgra don gyi rnam pa yod pa bkag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro // 'on te 'khrul ba dang ni ma 'khrul pa //
translated: The doubt that is the opposite of certainty, which is not clear, is engaged in the opposing side that is asserted to be external. Therefore, the conventions of engagement and withdrawal with regard to the negation of the existence of the aspects of word and meaning are interrupted.üîΩIf one says that the cognition of the object is not different from the cognition of the sense faculty, then all cognitions produced by the sense faculties, whether mistaken or nonmistaken,

original: brtags dang ma brtags pa dag ni //
analyzed: brtags dang ma brtags pa dag ni //
translated: imagined or nonimagined,

original: dkar po nag po la sogs pa'i //üîΩdbang po las skyes mtha' dag ni //
analyzed: dkar po nag po la sogs pa'i // dbang po las skyes mtha' dag ni //
translated: such as the cognition of white, black, and so on,

original: shes pa las gzhan tha dad de //
analyzed: shes pa las gzhan tha dad de //
translated: would be different from consciousness.

original: lhan cig dmigs kyi snga ma dang // phyi ma nyid ni rig pa med //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs kyi snga ma dang // phyi ma nyid ni rig pa med //
translated: But the former and the latter are not known to be simultaneously observed.

original: ces pa sna tshogs gnyis su med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phyogs la 'di shin tu yang thal bar 'gyur ro//
analyzed: ces pa sna tshogs gnyis su med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phyogs la 'di shin tu yang thal bar 'gyur ro//
translated: This is a consequence that is extremely damaging to the position of nondual cognition of diversity.

original: des na 'di mi 'dod pa med na 'di ji ltar rigs pas skyed pa nyid de ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di mi 'dod pa med na 'di ji ltar rigs pas skyed pa nyid de ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you do not assert this, then how could it be logical to generate it?

original: ji ltar ni mi 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar ni mi 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: How is it not asserted?üîΩSince it is not two, there is no engagement or disengagement on the peak of the mountain of nonduality.

original: de nyid kyis na gnyis su med pa'i ri'i rtse mo la zhon pa la 'jug pa dang ldog pa med de des 'di ltar 'khor ba zhes pa dang de'i rgyu ji ltar du 'dod ces brjod de ;
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gnyis su med pa'i ri'i rtse mo la zhon pa la 'jug pa dang ldog pa med de des 'di ltar 'khor ba zhes pa dang de'i rgyu ji ltar du 'dod ces brjod de ;
translated: Since it is like that, how could it be asserted that there is a so-called sa·πÉsƒÅra and its cause?üîΩSince the power of the imagination projected by the engagement of mind does not arise from the power of imagination, it would be pointless to cultivate the path of the virtuous karma of the perfections.

original: sems kyi 'jug pas 'phangs pa'i kun tu brtags pa las byung ba'i stobs kyis bdag nyid can gyi bag chags kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas dge ba'i las pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi lam la goms par byed pa yang don med par 'gyur bas gang yang
analyzed: sems kyi 'jug pas 'phangs pa'i kun tu brtags pa las byung ba'i stobs kyis bdag nyid can gyi bag chags kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas dge ba'i las pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi lam la goms par byed pa yang don med par 'gyur bas gang yang
translated: Therefore, there is nothing

original: goms par mi byed la /
analyzed: goms par mi byed la /
translated: to cultivate.

original: @23a * // mi dge ba'i las srog chags gsod pa la sogs pa la ldog pa yang mi srid pa nyid do //
analyzed: @23a * // mi dge ba'i las srog chags gsod pa la sogs pa la ldog pa yang mi srid pa nyid do //
translated: It would also be impossible to turn away from the nonvirtuous karma of killing and so on.

original: rang rig pa nyid ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa'i phyir na gang ji ltar snang ba de shes pa'i ngo bo la de'i de nyid gal te yang 'khor bar 'jug na ni de ltar na ni thar par nam yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang rig pa nyid ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa'i phyir na gang ji ltar snang ba de shes pa'i ngo bo la de'i de nyid gal te yang 'khor bar 'jug na ni de ltar na ni thar par nam yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: Since self-awareness is one and not two, there is nothing other than that. Therefore, whatever appears is the essence of consciousness. If that is the nature of samsara, then there will never be liberation.

original: grol ba'i gnas skabs su gyur kyang gnyis med la gnyis med gzhan skye bar 'gyur bas de nyid du 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: grol ba'i gnas skabs su gyur kyang gnyis med la gnyis med gzhan skye bar 'gyur bas de nyid du 'jug pa ste /
translated: Even if there were a state of liberation, since nonduality would arise from nonduality, it would be samsara.

original: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni 'khor bar 'dod pa'i gnas skabs kyis 'di 'dra'o zhes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'khor bar thams cad du 'gyur gyi rnam par byang bar gang du yang min no //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni 'khor bar 'dod pa'i gnas skabs kyis 'di 'dra'o zhes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'khor bar thams cad du 'gyur gyi rnam par byang bar gang du yang min no //
translated: According to your assertion, all would be samsara, the nature of affliction, in the state of samsara, but none would be nirvana.

original: 'dir ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i byis pa la kun tu ma grags pa'i tha snyad du nye bar gzung ba'i sgro btags pa'i tha snyad kyi bdag nyid mi 'khrul pa'i kun rdzob la thams cad du gzhan du sgro 'dogs pa nyid ni 'khrul pa la gnas so
analyzed: 'dir ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i byis pa la kun tu ma grags pa'i tha snyad du nye bar gzung ba'i sgro btags pa'i tha snyad kyi bdag nyid mi 'khrul pa'i kun rdzob la thams cad du gzhan du sgro 'dogs pa nyid ni 'khrul pa la gnas so
translated: One may say: 'But, when one analyzes, one is confused about the conventional nature of the superimposition of terms, which is not at all renowned to the childish.

original: zhe na / rnam par brtags pa ni rjes su dpag pas sam ma yin pa dgag pa'i mngon sum gyi shes pa gzhan gyis te /
analyzed: zhe na / rnam par brtags pa ni rjes su dpag pas sam ma yin pa dgag pa'i mngon sum gyi shes pa gzhan gyis te /
translated: One analyzes by means of inference or by means of another consciousness, a direct perception of negation.

original: de la rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis nges pa ni rtogs pa med la yul la ltos na ni rtog pa ni shes na gzhan ni rtog pa nyid de /
analyzed: de la rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis nges pa ni rtogs pa med la yul la ltos na ni rtog pa ni shes na gzhan ni rtog pa nyid de /
translated: As for the ascertainment by means of the direct perception of self-awareness, if there is no realization, but there is dependence on an object, then, if the object is cognized, it is a conceptual consciousness.

original: de la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa rang dgar te bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid nges par rtogs pa yin zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa rang dgar te bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid nges par rtogs pa yin zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: In this regard, it is said that a conceptual consciousness ascertains the nature of itself by itself in a random way.

original: rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa la sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir la de yang rang rig pa'i mngon sum nyid ni rnam par rtog par mi rigs so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa la sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir la de yang rang rig pa'i mngon sum nyid ni rnam par rtog par mi rigs so //
translated: Because it is not applied to the realization of other conceptual thoughts, and that is not suitable to be conceptual direct perception.

original: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i stong pa tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis rig par 'gyur ba'i shes pa'i de kho na nyid kyi 'dir don dam par rang rig par yod pa ma yin par ni mngon sum gyis ma grub la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i stong pa tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis rig par 'gyur ba'i shes pa'i de kho na nyid kyi 'dir don dam par rang rig par yod pa ma yin par ni mngon sum gyis ma grub la /
translated: Therefore, the reality of consciousness, which is emptiness devoid of the aspects of apprehended and apprehender, is not established by direct perception here in the ultimate, where reflexive awareness does not exist.

original: rjes su dpags pas kyang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpags pas kyang mi 'grub ste /
translated: It is also not established by inference.

original: rang bzhin las skyes pa'i rtags med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin las skyes pa'i rtags med de /
translated: There is no reason arising from essence,

original: rang bzhin de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that essence itself is what is to be proven.

original: 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yang min te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa yang min te /
translated: Nor does it arise from a reason of effect,

original: gnyis su med pa de dang lhan cig gang du yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por ma grub ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa de dang lhan cig gang du yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por ma grub ste /
translated: because nonduality is not established anywhere as a causal entity together with that.

original: de dbang po las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir dang de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu yang yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de dbang po las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir dang de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu yang yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Because it is beyond the sense faculties, and there is no other result.

original: gnyis su med pas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'dzin pa yang @23b min no //
analyzed: gnyis su med pas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'dzin pa yang @23b min no //
translated: And because it is nondual, it is not even apprehended as the entity of cause and effect.

original: mi dmigs pa ni med pas bsgrub pa'i go skabs med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni med pas bsgrub pa'i go skabs med do //
translated: Nonapprehension is not established by nonexistence.

original: de nas gang gsal bar byed pa de shes pa ste /
analyzed: de nas gang gsal bar byed pa de shes pa ste /
translated: Then, that which illuminates is consciousness.

original: dper na rmi lam du mthong ba'i gsal ba bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na rmi lam du mthong ba'i gsal ba bzhin te /
translated: For example, like the illumination seen in a dream.

original: sngon po la sogs pa yang ngo zhes sngon po la sogs par gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa yang ngo zhes sngon po la sogs par gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad tsam sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The illumination of blue and so on is also established by a natural reason as merely the convention of consciousness. It is not established as the entity of cause and effect.

original: sngon po la sogs pa ni phyi rol du rnam par chad pa'i yul du gsal bar bya ba nyid du nges par 'byed pas gsal bar byed pa zhes ma grub pa la gsal bar byed pa'i sngon po la sogs pa zhes pa'i tshig ni gsal bar byed pa'i
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ni phyi rol du rnam par chad pa'i yul du gsal bar bya ba nyid du nges par 'byed pas gsal bar byed pa zhes ma grub pa la gsal bar byed pa'i sngon po la sogs pa zhes pa'i tshig ni gsal bar byed pa'i
translated: Since blue and so on are ascertained to be the object that is clearly manifest as an external, divided object, the term ‚Äúclearly manifest‚Äù is not established as a clearly manifest blue and so on.

original: byed pa po'i chos kyi gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: byed pa po'i chos kyi gtan tshigs te /
translated: The term ‚Äúclearly manifest‚Äù is a reason of the quality of the agent.

original: rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma grub pas de'i 'thad pa ma grub pa'i phyir ji ltar na gsal bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs la bden par rang gsal bar yod pa tha snyad kyi bya ba ma grub pa'i gsal bas gsal ba grub ces pa ni med de /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma grub pas de'i 'thad pa ma grub pa'i phyir ji ltar na gsal bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs la bden par rang gsal bar yod pa tha snyad kyi bya ba ma grub pa'i gsal bas gsal ba grub ces pa ni med de /
translated: Since reflexive awareness is not established, its logic is not established. Therefore, how could the clearly manifest reason be truly established as self-clarity? The term ‚Äúclearly manifest‚Äù is not established as a clearly manifest that is not established as a conventional action.

original: phan tshun rten pa'i skyon gyis na gcig kyang ma grub pa min no //
analyzed: phan tshun rten pa'i skyon gyis na gcig kyang ma grub pa min no //
translated: Since the error of mutual reliance is not established, one is not established.

original: tha snyad du yang so so skye bos rnam par ma brtags pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la the tshom med par tha snyad byed kyi gang du rang rig pa'i mngon sum grub pa'i thos zlos tsam yang med pa gang de ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin
analyzed: tha snyad du yang so so skye bos rnam par ma brtags pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la the tshom med par tha snyad byed kyi gang du rang rig pa'i mngon sum grub pa'i thos zlos tsam yang med pa gang de ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin
translated: Even conventionally, ordinary beings, without analyzing, use conventions without any doubt about the existence of percepts and their perceivers. But that which is not even established by the mere testimony of others, by a direct perception of reflexive awareness, is not a thesis.

original: par brjod do //
analyzed: par brjod do //
translated: It is said that it is not a thesis.

original: rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe la yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub byed dag tu khyab pa nges pa med pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe la yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub byed dag tu khyab pa nges pa med pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: Also, in the case of examples such as dreams and illusions, there is no ascertainment of the pervasion between the probandum and the logical reason, and so the reason is not established.

original: de nas gzhan gyi dbyibs kyi gsal ba'i las dang chos tha dad pa'i dbyibs ni byed pa po'i chos dang ste gnyi ga khas ma blangs na sngon po la sogs pa'i gsal ba tsam po'i bsgrub par bya ba can gyi dbang po'i mngon sum na ni grub pa
analyzed: de nas gzhan gyi dbyibs kyi gsal ba'i las dang chos tha dad pa'i dbyibs ni byed pa po'i chos dang ste gnyi ga khas ma blangs na sngon po la sogs pa'i gsal ba tsam po'i bsgrub par bya ba can gyi dbang po'i mngon sum na ni grub pa
translated: Then, the shape that is different from the shape of the other, the shape that is different from the shape of the action, is the property of the agent. If both are not accepted, then in the case of the mere probandum, the mere clarity of blue and so on, the sense direct perception, the reason is established.

original: la sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: la sgrub pa ste /
translated: It is a proof.

original: 'di ni gdod nas gnyis med rigs par bshad pa ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mi zlog ste /
analyzed: 'di ni gdod nas gnyis med rigs par bshad pa ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mi zlog ste /
translated: This is the explanation of the non-duality from the beginning. The clarity of the nature cannot be refuted.üîΩAnd also:

original: 'di nyid gang gis bzlog kyang ni //
analyzed: 'di nyid gang gis bzlog kyang ni //
translated: No matter who tries to refute it,

original: mi zlogs mngon sum nyid mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi zlogs mngon sum nyid mthong ngo //
translated: it cannot be refuted, for it is seen by direct perception.

original: zhes te / de ltar na ni dbang pa'i mngon sum gyis rtogs bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i gsal ba'i las la chos su bshad par 'gyur la /
analyzed: zhes te / de ltar na ni dbang pa'i mngon sum gyis rtogs bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i gsal ba'i las la chos su bshad par 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, the clarity of the object, such as the blue that is being perceived by the direct perception of the sense faculty, would be explained as the phenomenon.

original: 'on te gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos nyid kyis gsal ba tsam grub kyang /
analyzed: 'on te gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos nyid kyis gsal ba tsam grub kyang /
translated: But if it is the mere clarity that is established by the phenomenon that is neither of the two,

original: rang rig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dpe sngon du bshad pa'i rigs @24a * //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dpe sngon du bshad pa'i rigs @24a * //
translated: then the example of the object of the self-awareness is not established by the reasoning explained earlier.

original: pas khyab pa ma nges pas ma nges pa kho na bas 'dir rjes su dpag pas kyang bdag nyid kyis rig pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: pas khyab pa ma nges pas ma nges pa kho na bas 'dir rjes su dpag pas kyang bdag nyid kyis rig pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: Since the pervasion is not ascertained, it is only uncertain. Therefore, it is not established by inference that there is self-awareness.

original: 'di nyid kyis na sgra don rnam par rig par smra ba'i slob dpon zhi ba'i 'che dang de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i seng ge bzang po la sogs pas kun rdzob tu yang phyi rol med pas gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis na sgra don rnam par rig par smra ba'i slob dpon zhi ba'i 'che dang de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i seng ge bzang po la sogs pas kun rdzob tu yang phyi rol med pas gnyis su med de /
translated: Therefore, the master ≈öƒÅntarak·π£ita, who asserts that consciousness is aware of itself, and Haribhadra, who follows his assertions, say that even conventionally there is no external reality and therefore there is no duality.

original: kun rdzob tu sngon po la sogs pa ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sgra don la don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med ces pa'i 'dod pa ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu sngon po la sogs pa ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sgra don la don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med ces pa'i 'dod pa ni mi 'thad de /
translated: They assert that conventionally blue and so on are the nature of reflexive awareness, but ultimately they are essenceless. This assertion is untenable.

original: sngon po la sogs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pas 'dir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ces par 'dod pa ni mi rigs pa nyid de /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pas 'dir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ces par 'dod pa ni mi rigs pa nyid de /
translated: Since blue and so on are not established as the nature of nonduality, it is illogical to assert that the wheel of the aspects of blue and so on is the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rang nyid gsal bar byed pas sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra don gsal bar byed pa de nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rang nyid gsal bar byed pas sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra don gsal bar byed pa de nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Since consciousness without aspects is itself clear, it is not the case that it is clear by virtue of the clarity of the object, such as blue.

original: sngon po las gzhan pa'i rnam pa med pa mngon sum gyis gsal ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po las gzhan pa'i rnam pa med pa mngon sum gyis gsal ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that direct perception clearly shows that there is no aspect other than blue.

original: rmi lam du yang nyams su myong ba de ji srid pa'i gnas skabs su yang ste /
analyzed: rmi lam du yang nyams su myong ba de ji srid pa'i gnas skabs su yang ste /
translated: Nor is it the case that it is experienced in dreams.üîΩTherefore, there is not the slightest evidence of the existence of a permanent, hidden entity that is the basis of the experience of blue.

original: de nyid kyis na rtag par lkog tu gyur pa'i gsal ba la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas rjes su rtogs pa'i rtags cung zad kyang yod pa min zhes pas na rjes su dpag pa de nges pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rtag par lkog tu gyur pa'i gsal ba la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas rjes su rtogs pa'i rtags cung zad kyang yod pa min zhes pas na rjes su dpag pa de nges pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the inference of the existence of such an entity is not valid.

original: gang yang rang gi rgyud kyi gsal ba'i bdag nyid rjes su dpag pas nges zhes pa 'di ni gsal bar bram ze'i lta ba ste /
analyzed: gang yang rang gi rgyud kyi gsal ba'i bdag nyid rjes su dpag pas nges zhes pa 'di ni gsal bar bram ze'i lta ba ste /
translated: The assertion that the existence of a permanent entity that is the basis of the experience of blue is established by inference is the view of the Brahmins.

original: de la 'dir gang snang du rung ba'i bdag nyid mi dmigs par byed pa ni med pa'i tha snyad du bya ste /
analyzed: de la 'dir gang snang du rung ba'i bdag nyid mi dmigs par byed pa ni med pa'i tha snyad du bya ste /
translated: In this regard, the nonperception of an entity that is capable of appearing is called its nonexistence.

original: 'dir sngon po rtogs par byed pas rtogs pa grub na de yang rnam pa med pas sngon po la sogs pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir sngon po rtogs par byed pas rtogs pa grub na de yang rnam pa med pas sngon po la sogs pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the existence of the entity that is the basis of the experience of blue were established by the experience of blue, then that entity would have to be without an aspect, and that would contradict the experience of blue.

original: de la ba lang khra bo gang zhig mthong bar byed pa dang khra bo'i phru gu dag la ba lang dag nyid du so sor rtogs pa yod pa la ba lang nyid du yang mngon sum gyis grub bo zhes pa na ni /
analyzed: de la ba lang khra bo gang zhig mthong bar byed pa dang khra bo'i phru gu dag la ba lang dag nyid du so sor rtogs pa yod pa la ba lang nyid du yang mngon sum gyis grub bo zhes pa na ni /
translated: In response to that, if you say that the perception of a multicolored cow and the perception of the individual calves are the perception of a cow, and that the cow is established by direct perception,

original: ji ltar gong bu tsam du rtogs pa tha dad pas ni tha dad pa'i lam du min te /
analyzed: ji ltar gong bu tsam du rtogs pa tha dad pas ni tha dad pa'i lam du min te /
translated: then just as the perception of a mere lump is different, the path of the perception of a cow would be different.

original: de ltar dkar po tsam du rtogs par byed pa dang tha dad du gsal ba ma yin kyang ma rig pa'i dbang gis gsal ba dang / sngon po dag tha mi dad par gsal zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar dkar po tsam du rtogs par byed pa dang tha dad du gsal ba ma yin kyang ma rig pa'i dbang gis gsal ba dang / sngon po dag tha mi dad par gsal zhe na /
translated: If you say that just as the perception of mere white is not different, and the clear appearance of blue is not different, the clear appearance of the cow is not different from the perception of the individual calves,üîΩthen the same would be true of a universal and a substance.

original: spyi dang rdzas dag la yang de bzhin du 'gyur la ci ma rig pa'i dbang gis so sor myong ba'i don med pa nyid du nus zhes pa ni gnyi ga la @24b yang the tshom mo //
analyzed: spyi dang rdzas dag la yang de bzhin du 'gyur la ci ma rig pa'i dbang gis so sor myong ba'i don med pa nyid du nus zhes pa ni gnyi ga la @24b yang the tshom mo //
translated: If you say that the object of the individual experiences is nonexistent due to the power of ignorance, then there is doubt in both cases.

original: gal te sngon por mthong ba kho na gsal ba'i snang ba na /
analyzed: gal te sngon por mthong ba kho na gsal ba'i snang ba na /
translated: If the mere seeing of blue is the clear appearance,

original: de lta na ni gong bu mthong ba kho na spyi la sogs pa yang mthong zhes pa ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na ni gong bu mthong ba kho na spyi la sogs pa yang mthong zhes pa ni nus pa'o //
translated: In that case, the mere seeing of the mass is the seeing of the universal, etc.

original: gnod byed skye po la sogs pas mi gnod de /
analyzed: gnod byed skye po la sogs pas mi gnod de /
translated: It is not harmed by the arising of the harm-doer, etc.

original: rtogs pa'i tha dad pa yon zhe na /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i tha dad pa yon zhe na /
translated: If you say there is a difference in the cognition,

original: gnod pa med par ma grub ste /
analyzed: gnod pa med par ma grub ste /
translated: it is not established without harm.

original: sngon po tha dad du gsal ba med pa'i phyir gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis gsal ba gang des sngon po cung zad gsal ba med do //
analyzed: sngon po tha dad du gsal ba med pa'i phyir gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis gsal ba gang des sngon po cung zad gsal ba med do //
translated: Because there is no difference in the manifestation of blue, there is no manifestation of blue by anything else.

original: mar mes bum pa gsal bas gsal ba bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: mar mes bum pa gsal bas gsal ba bzhin no zhe na /
translated: If you say it is like a pot being manifested by a lamp,

original: de la yang gal te tha dad na de bzhin kho nar 'gyur la des gzhan bden pa ma yin pa la bden pa yang gsal ba med do //
analyzed: de la yang gal te tha dad na de bzhin kho nar 'gyur la des gzhan bden pa ma yin pa la bden pa yang gsal ba med do //
translated: in that case, if there is a difference, it would be just like that. By that, there is no manifestation of the true in the untrue.

original: sngon po ni gzhan nyid du med pa'i phyir sgra don no zhe na /
analyzed: sngon po ni gzhan nyid du med pa'i phyir sgra don no zhe na /
translated: If you say blue is the meaning of the word because it does not exist as other,

original: gzhan nyid du med na gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang yod par mi 'gyur zhes pa nyid des na 'di'i rigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du med na gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang yod par mi 'gyur zhes pa nyid des na 'di'i rigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: if it does not exist as other, the nature of manifestation would not exist. By that very fact, its reasoning would be nonexistent.

original: ma rig pa'i dbang gis rjes su med kyang sngon po'i sgra don du gsal bar byed la sngon po dang gsal ba bdag tu btags pa yang de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i 'dod pa ni ci yang min te /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i dbang gis rjes su med kyang sngon po'i sgra don du gsal bar byed la sngon po dang gsal ba bdag tu btags pa yang de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i 'dod pa ni ci yang min te /
translated: The assertion that the meaning of the word blue is clarified by blue, even though there is no connection by virtue of ignorance, and that blue and clarification are designated as the self of that, etc., is nothing at all,üîΩbecause the object of the conception that consciousness is merely reflexive awareness has been refuted.

original: shes pa rnam pa thams cad rang rig pa tsam po nyid du brtags pa'i dmigs pa la sogs pa bkag pa'i phyir ro ma rig pa'i dbang gis de ltar grags zhes pa'i ma rig pas sngon po la gsal bar byed pa nyid na ma rig pa'i skyed pa
analyzed: shes pa rnam pa thams cad rang rig pa tsam po nyid du brtags pa'i dmigs pa la sogs pa bkag pa'i phyir ro ma rig pa'i dbang gis de ltar grags zhes pa'i ma rig pas sngon po la gsal bar byed pa nyid na ma rig pa'i skyed pa
translated: The ignorance that is said to cause such renown is the ignorance that, when blue is clarified, is the producer of ignorance.

original: por gyur pas gsal bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni sngon po sgra don du rtogs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: por gyur pas gsal bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni sngon po sgra don du rtogs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is not clarified, it is said that blue is not even realized as the meaning of the word.

original: sgra don gyi sngon po la sogs pa ni 'bras bu nyid du med ce na min te /
analyzed: sgra don gyi sngon po la sogs pa ni 'bras bu nyid du med ce na min te /
translated: If it is said that blue, etc., as the meaning of the word does not exist as the effect, that is not so.

original: rang nyid grub pa la gzhan gyi bya ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa la ni 'bras bur brjod la /
analyzed: rang nyid grub pa la gzhan gyi bya ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa la ni 'bras bur brjod la /
translated: That which is established as itself and is related to the activity of another is said to be the effect.

original: sngon po ni yul dus nges pas skyes pas 'bras bu gzhan bzhin du ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar mi 'dod /
analyzed: sngon po ni yul dus nges pas skyes pas 'bras bu gzhan bzhin du ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar mi 'dod /
translated: Since blue arises in a specific place and time, why do you not assert that it arises from another, like any other effect?üîΩSince blue is seen to arise from another, blue, consciousness does not arise from itself.

original: sngon po ni gzhan las sngon po skye ba mthong ba de'i phyir med pas shes pa ni snang ba med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dod pas rtogs par byas te /
analyzed: sngon po ni gzhan las sngon po skye ba mthong ba de'i phyir med pas shes pa ni snang ba med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dod pas rtogs par byas te /
translated: Since you assert that consciousness arises from blue, you should understand that consciousness does not arise from that which lacks blue, such as sound.

original: ma mthong ba la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mi rtog pas mi 'grub bo /üîΩ'dir bde ba la sogs pa can gyi rjes su gzung ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can ni rang gi nang du gsal bar byed la /
analyzed: ma mthong ba la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mi rtog pas mi 'grub bo / 'dir bde ba la sogs pa can gyi rjes su gzung ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can ni rang gi nang du gsal bar byed la /
translated: Since you do not see consciousness arising from that which lacks blue, you cannot establish that consciousness arises from that which lacks blue.üîΩHere, the nature of the apprehender of blue and so on is the nature of the experiencer of pleasure and so on.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gnas par rnam @25a * //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gnas par rnam @25a * //
translated: The aspect of pleasure and so on also has the aspect of blue and so on.

original: par med pa'i shes pas rlom par byed pa'i gnas pa ni don de la ma rig pa'i dbang gis rnam par chad pa'i yul du sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra don gyis gsal ba can du nyams su myong bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: par med pa'i shes pas rlom par byed pa'i gnas pa ni don de la ma rig pa'i dbang gis rnam par chad pa'i yul du sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra don gyis gsal ba can du nyams su myong bar 'gyur la /
translated: The basis for the conceit of a consciousness without an object is the experience of an object that is cut off by the power of ignorance. It is experienced as being clarified by the meaning of a word such as ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: sgra don dam par med pa'i phyir na de la ltos pas 'dir 'dzin pa yang ma yin zhes pas na gnyis su med ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: sgra don dam par med pa'i phyir na de la ltos pas 'dir 'dzin pa yang ma yin zhes pas na gnyis su med ces bya zhe na /
translated: Since the meaning of the word is ultimately nonexistent, it is not apprehended in dependence on it. Therefore it is said to be nondual.

original: rang rig pa tsam la ni bde ba la sogs pa med la /
analyzed: rang rig pa tsam la ni bde ba la sogs pa med la /
translated: In mere reflexive awareness, there is no pleasure and so on.

original: gzhan rig pa na ma rig pa mi srid pa'am 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhan rig ste /
analyzed: gzhan rig pa na ma rig pa mi srid pa'am 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhan rig ste /
translated: When there is awareness of something other, ignorance is impossible. Since there is no apprehension, how can there be awareness of something other?

original: de yang thams cad du khyad par med pas de srid du dus gcig yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rig pa tha dad pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dus can rnams 'dir rig par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang thams cad du khyad par med pas de srid du dus gcig yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rig pa tha dad pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dus can rnams 'dir rig par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, since that [awareness] is undifferentiated in all respects, it would follow that as long as it exists, it would be simultaneous with the awareness of blue and so on that exists in other mind streams. It would be an awareness that has the nature of being different in terms of time.

original: tshogs pa gcig la yang rag mi las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la yang rag mi las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not dependent on a single collection.üîΩAccording to your assertion, sound is not the effect of the object such as blue,

original: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni sgra don gyi sngon po la sogs par 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni sgra don gyi sngon po la sogs par 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
translated: because it is not dependent on it.

original: rag mi las pa nyid ces pa ste /
analyzed: rag mi las pa nyid ces pa ste /
translated: It is not dependent on it.

original: rgyu gcig las byung ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu yod par des rig pa yang min te /
analyzed: rgyu gcig las byung ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu yod par des rig pa yang min te /
translated: Even though they arise from a single cause, they are not cognized simultaneously by that consciousness,

original: dus gcig par rang rang gi ngo bo nges pa nyid kyis rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang yang nye bar len pa med pa rnams ni kun rdzob tu yang med pas tshu rol mthong ba'i spyod yul min pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes par gcig tu bden par 'dod de ji ltar dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam
analyzed: dus gcig par rang rang gi ngo bo nges pa nyid kyis rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro // gang yang nye bar len pa med pa rnams ni kun rdzob tu yang med pas tshu rol mthong ba'i spyod yul min pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes par gcig tu bden par 'dod de ji ltar dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam
translated: because they are definitely of their own individual natures, and they completely exclude their own and other natures.üîΩAlso, those that are without appropriation do not exist even conventionally, and therefore they are not the objects of the experience of the world. They are asserted to be consciousnesses that are truly singular and devoid of aspects.

original: de la bden pa'i rang rig pa'i rang gi rgyud la lkog tu gyur pa rjes su dpag pas sgrub ces pa'i rtags ni sgra don gyis sngon po la sogs pa can no zhes pa nye bar dgos pa ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de la bden pa'i rang rig pa'i rang gi rgyud la lkog tu gyur pa rjes su dpag pas sgrub ces pa'i rtags ni sgra don gyis sngon po la sogs pa can no zhes pa nye bar dgos pa ni mi rigs so //
translated: In that case, it is not reasonable to say that the self-awareness of reality is hidden in one‚Äôs continuum and is established by inference. The reason is that the meaning of the term is that it is the possessor of blue, etc.

original: nye bar len pa'i kun rdzob de kun rdzob tu gang zhig de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas rjes su brtags na ma dmigs pa las sa bon dang myu gu lta bu ni mi mkhas pa la mkhas par mngon par rlom pa'i shes pa la /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i kun rdzob de kun rdzob tu gang zhig de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas rjes su brtags na ma dmigs pa las sa bon dang myu gu lta bu ni mi mkhas pa la mkhas par mngon par rlom pa'i shes pa la /
translated: The appropriated convention is a convention that is imputed by the subsequent conformity and reversal of that which is a convention. That which is not observed in the case of a seed and a sprout is for the sake of the consciousness that is the conceit of expertise for the non-expert.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i kun rdzob kyis rang gi ngo bos dngos po med par gyur pa nyid la sa bon du rigs pa'i dngos por med de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i kun rdzob kyis rang gi ngo bos dngos po med par gyur pa nyid la sa bon du rigs pa'i dngos por med de /
translated: The convention of the nature of non-entityness is the entityness of non-entityness that is the seed of the entityness that is the nature of non-entityness.

original: de'i de 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i de 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is contradictory.

original: don dam pa'i sa bon ni gang du yang med pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma grub pa sgra don gyi sngon por snang ba nyid ces pa la ni gang du 'jug ste /üîΩshes pa la @25b sogs pa la mnyam par brten pas bdag smra ba dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa'i sa bon ni gang du yang med pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma grub pa sgra don gyi sngon por snang ba nyid ces pa la ni gang du 'jug ste / shes pa la @25b sogs pa la mnyam par brten pas bdag smra ba dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: Since the seed of the ultimate does not exist anywhere, the nonestablishment of the seed of the ultimate is not established.üîΩSince the seed of the ultimate does not exist anywhere, the original: khyad par gyi gzhal bya bdag nyid kyis mi gsal yang de gnas pa mi 'gal zhes pa'i gsal ba bdag nyid kyis brjod par mi nus pa la ni sun 'byin pa gzhal bya la ltos pa med do //üîΩ'di rnams kyis ni gang zhig rtogs pa tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i ngo bo kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni dngos po sngon po zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos rjes su 'jug ste /
analyzed: khyad par gyi gzhal bya bdag nyid kyis mi gsal yang de gnas pa mi 'gal zhes pa'i gsal ba bdag nyid kyis brjod par mi nus pa la ni sun 'byin pa gzhal bya la ltos pa med do //üîΩ'di rnams kyis ni gang zhig rtogs pa tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i ngo bo kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni dngos po sngon po zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos rjes su 'jug ste /
translated: Since the seed of the ultimate does not exist anywhere, the nonestablishment of the seed of the ultimate is not established.üîΩSince the seed of the ultimate does not exist anywhere, the

original: de'i phyir bag chags la brten pas sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur la rang gi skad cig la ni de rnams kyang yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa de rnams ni med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir bag chags la brten pas sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur la rang gi skad cig la ni de rnams kyang yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa de rnams ni med de /
translated: Therefore, because they are based on latent propensities, consciousnesses of blue and so on arise, but those latent propensities do not exist in the present moment in the foundation consciousness.

original: bag chags la gnod pa byed na ni sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa bsgoms par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bag chags la gnod pa byed na ni sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa bsgoms par 'gyur bas /
translated: If they were to harm latent propensities, they would meditate on the nonexistence of things such as blue.üîΩTherefore consciousness that is empty of those latent propensities arises and nondual consciousness is actualized.
