translated: Since there is no proof of the non-existence of the object of the mind,

original: sems med pa nyid kyang med ces gsungs pa ni ci ltar yang 'di zhes pa la /
analyzed: sems med pa nyid kyang med ces gsungs pa ni ci ltar yang 'di zhes pa la /
translated: the statement ‚Äúthere is no non-existence of mind‚Äù is intended to indicate that this is not so.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob tu so sor rig par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni 'gyur ba med ces pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob tu so sor rig par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni 'gyur ba med ces pa ste /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthere is no change‚Äù is intended to indicate that the yogi/nƒ´ should understand the conventional.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang / @37b sems 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis ma gos ba'i phyir na 'gyur ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang / @37b sems 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis ma gos ba'i phyir na 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: Since it is naturally luminous and is not tainted by the changes of desire and so forth, it is unchanging.

original: spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi zhing rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi zhing rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: Since it is the pacification of all elaborations and is not the domain of any conceptualization, it is non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir sems des kyang slom sems su mi byed de /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems des kyang slom sems su mi byed de /
translated: Therefore, that mind also does not make assumptions.

original: de'i yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rog cig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rog cig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its own essence is empty, and is of the same nature as emptiness.

original: de lta yin yang de'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhes dmigs pa de'i yang rlom sems med pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: de lta yin yang de'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhes dmigs pa de'i yang rlom sems med pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: Even though that is so, the phrase ‚Äúthat mind is naturally luminous‚Äù is a reference to the absence of assumptions about that.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúmind is not mind‚Äù is to be understood in the sense that mind is empty of mind.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúform is not form‚Äù is to be understood in the sense that form is empty of form.

original: ji ltar sems ni sems med pa'i dang / de ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams la gzugs la sogs pa med ces pa don gyis rtogs te gang du phung po lnga rnams stong pa nyid du mnyam par gsungs la 'dir ni rang bzhin gyi phyir dang mchog tu skyes bu'i don gyi rgyu nyid kyis na gtsoüîΩbo'i phyir na /
analyzed: ji ltar sems ni sems med pa'i dang / de ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams la gzugs la sogs pa med ces pa don gyis rtogs te gang du phung po lnga rnams stong pa nyid du mnyam par gsungs la 'dir ni rang bzhin gyi phyir dang mchog tu skyes bu'i don gyi rgyu nyid kyis na gtso bo'i phyir na /
translated: The five aggregates are said to be the same in being empty.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid du bsgrub bar mngon par 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid du bsgrub bar mngon par 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: Here, however, form and so on are established as having the essence of bodhicitta, because they are the principal cause of the supreme human goal, because they are the supreme cause of the human goal.

original: drod la sogs pa dbye ba rnams kyi dmigs pa dang rnam pa ste /
analyzed: drod la sogs pa dbye ba rnams kyi dmigs pa dang rnam pa ste /
translated: The objects and aspects of the divisions of heat and so on are as follows.

original: de dang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni ldog pa'i dbye bas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni ldog pa'i dbye bas shes par bya'o //
translated: The opposites of these should be understood through the categories of their reversals.

original: 'on kyang mi zhes pa ni gsal ba 'di rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi zhes pa ni gsal ba 'di rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: However, the word ‚Äúperson‚Äù means the manifestation of this kind.

original: nyon mongs pa med pa zhes pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa zhes pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa gnyis te /
translated: The two meditative attainments called ‚Äúwithout conflict‚Äù are as follows:

original: gcig gis ni pha rol gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa yang mi 'gog ste /
analyzed: gcig gis ni pha rol gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa yang mi 'gog ste /
translated: One of them does not even stop the conflict of others‚Äô continua.

original: de 'dir gzung bar bya ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de 'dir gzung bar bya ba ma yin la /
translated: That is not to be taken here.

original: gang du rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa 'gegs pa pa de 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang du rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa 'gegs pa pa de 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
translated: That which stops the conflict of conceptualization is to be taken here.

original: skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the context.

original: 'dir yang zhes pa ni 'di lta bu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa ni drod chung du nas phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa ni 'di lta bu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa ni drod chung du nas phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Here, ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that the special object and aspect of this kind are from the lesser heat up to the irreversible.

original: gang zhig dbang po rnon po dang 'bring dang shes rab rtul pos ni rab tu dga' ba dang / mi g-yo ba dag la'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dbang po rnon po dang 'bring dang shes rab rtul pos ni rab tu dga' ba dang / mi g-yo ba dag la'o //
translated: Those of sharp, medium, and dull faculties are in the Joyous and the Immovable.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral zhes pa ni des gong nas gong du yang ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral zhes pa ni des gong nas gong du yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúNot separated from the perfection of wisdom‚Äù means that it is not separated from the perfection of wisdom in the future.

original: drod chung ngu'i rang bzhin ni gong gi rnams la yang rdzes su sbyor ba'i phyir bcu gnyis po rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyi khyad par gyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos su /
analyzed: drod chung ngu'i rang bzhin ni gong gi rnams la yang rdzes su sbyor ba'i phyir bcu gnyis po rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyi khyad par gyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos su /
translated: Since the nature of weak heat is also applied to the higher stages, the treatise declares:

original: theg pa gsum char thob pa'i rgyu zhes te /
analyzed: theg pa gsum char thob pa'i rgyu zhes te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe cause of attaining the three vehicles.‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drod la sogs pa ni byang chub rnam pa gsum thob pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drod la sogs pa ni byang chub rnam pa gsum thob pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The heat, etc., of the bodhisattvas are the cause for attaining the three kinds of enlightenment.

original: kha cig phyir mi ldog pa la rigs kyi @38a * //
analyzed: kha cig phyir mi ldog pa la rigs kyi @38a * //
translated: Some, by the power of their lineage, attain the lesser enlightenment of a ≈õrƒÅvaka,

original: stobs kyis dman pa'i byang chub kyang thob pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: stobs kyis dman pa'i byang chub kyang thob pa'i phyir la /
translated: because they do not attain the great enlightenment of a buddha.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag gi drod la sogs pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub gang du yang thob bar mi byed do //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag gi drod la sogs pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub gang du yang thob bar mi byed do //
translated: The heat, etc., of those in the ≈õrƒÅvaka and pratyekabuddha vehicles do not cause the attainment of any kind of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: gang du gsungs pa'i nyan thos kyi sa zhes pa ni 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pas sa ste /
analyzed: gang du gsungs pa'i nyan thos kyi sa zhes pa ni 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pas sa ste /
translated: The ‚Äúlevel of the ≈õrƒÅvakas‚Äù mentioned in the above verse is the level that will be described below.

original: de de'i rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: de de'i rgyu mtshan no //
translated: It is the cause of that.

original: mnyan par bya ba ni gzhung ngo //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba ni gzhung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be listened to‚Äù refers to the text.

original: gzung bar bya ba ni sems la gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ni sems la gzhag par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be taken up‚Äù means to be placed in the mind.

original: klag bar bya ba ni rjed pa'i phyir kha ton du bya ba'o //
analyzed: klag bar bya ba ni rjed pa'i phyir kha ton du bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be read‚Äù means to be recited in order to memorize it.

original: kun chub bar bya ba ni don to rnam pa thams cad du shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun chub bar bya ba ni don to rnam pa thams cad du shes par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be mastered‚Äù means to be understood in all its aspects.

original: rab tu gdon par bya ba ni gzhan rnams la yang don dang gzhung dag kun tu bsgrags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu gdon par bya ba ni gzhan rnams la yang don dang gzhung dag kun tu bsgrags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be proclaimed‚Äù means to be proclaimed to others in terms of both its meaning and its text.

original: bslab par bya ba ni sems pas so //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni sems pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be trained in‚Äù means to be contemplated.

original: rnal 'byor du bya ba zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bya bas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor du bya ba zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bya bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be practiced‚Äù means to be practiced through the activity of equipoise on serenity and insight.

original: bsgom par bya ba ni nges par dus dang dngos por gyur pas so //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba ni nges par dus dang dngos por gyur pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be cultivated‚Äù means to be definitely practiced at a certain time and in a certain situation.

original: rtogs par bya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi las nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtogs par bya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi las nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúTo be realized‚Äù means to be realized through the activity of practice.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni rab tu dga' ba nas ji srid du chos kyi sprin gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni rab tu dga' ba nas ji srid du chos kyi sprin gyi bar du'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are from the Joyous to the Cloud of Dharma.

original: thabs la mkhas pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig pa'i sems kyi khyad par la yang dag par 'du ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig pa'i sems kyi khyad par la yang dag par 'du ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Skill in means is the special mind that is one taste in the conventional and the ultimate.

original: 'bring ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'bring ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The medium is in the treatise:

original: gzugs sogs skye 'jig ces te ming gis zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs sogs skye 'jig ces te ming gis zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúForm and so forth are born and perish‚Äù is by name.

original: gnas bral dang gnas dang zhes te /
analyzed: gnas bral dang gnas dang zhes te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe abode is free from abode‚Äù is by name.

original: ming de yang med ces pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ming de yang med ces pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat name also does not exist‚Äù is by name.

original: 'di nyid gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is stated: ‚ÄúThen the bodhisattvas‚Äù and so forth.

original: ma 'tshal pa ni don dam la ste mi shes pa'o //üîΩma tshal zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ni ma dmigs shes pa ste mngon sum gyis so //
analyzed: ma 'tshal pa ni don dam la ste mi shes pa'o // ma tshal zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ni ma dmigs shes pa ste mngon sum gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot known‚Äù is in the ultimate, not known.üîΩ‚ÄúNot known‚Äù is the brief explanation. ‚ÄúNot observed‚Äù is by direct perception.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes pa ni rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes pa ni rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot seen‚Äù is by inference.

original: ngan du byed pa'i dngos po ni yid la gcags pa ste /
analyzed: ngan du byed pa'i dngos po ni yid la gcags pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBadly done‚Äù is regret.

original: mi rigs par byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi rigs par byas pa nyid do //
translated: It is not right to do so.

original: ming du btags pa tsam zhes pa ni don dam stong pas ming ngo //
analyzed: ming du btags pa tsam zhes pa ni don dam stong pas ming ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúmerely a nominal designation‚Äù means that it is a name because of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes zer yang nye bar mtshon pa min par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes zer yang nye bar mtshon pa min par shes par bya'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfor example, a bodhisattva‚Äù means that even though one says ‚Äúa bodhisattva,‚Äù one should understand that it is not a designation.

original: yod pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa mi dgag ste /
analyzed: yod pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa mi dgag ste /
translated: The arising and ceasing of an existent are not refuted.

original: don dam par ni yod pa dang dgag pa las nges par grol @38b pas gzugs la sogs pa can la dmigs pa'i zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni yod pa dang dgag pa las nges par grol @38b pas gzugs la sogs pa can la dmigs pa'i zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In the ultimate sense, since one is liberated from existence and nonexistence, it is said that ‚Äúone should not apprehend form, etc.‚Äù

original: mi gnas pa'i ther zug pa'i rtag pa dang / de dang 'dra ba rab tu rgyu ba'i rtag pas so //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i ther zug pa'i rtag pa dang / de dang 'dra ba rab tu rgyu ba'i rtag pas so //
translated: It is because of the permanence of non-abiding and the permanence of the continuity of the like.

original: dgag bya med pa la de kho na nyid nges par dgag pa yod pa min zhing yul med pa la bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yod pa yang min te /
analyzed: dgag bya med pa la de kho na nyid nges par dgag pa yod pa min zhing yul med pa la bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yod pa yang min te /
translated: In the absence of an object of negation, there is no negation of reality, and in the absence of an object, there is no application of an affirmation.

original: dgag pa rnam par rtog ba la brten pa nyid kyang kun rdzob par 'gyur gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag pa rnam par rtog ba la brten pa nyid kyang kun rdzob par 'gyur gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas mi gnas pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Also, the negation that is based on conceptualization would be conventional, but not reality. The reasoning that it is not non-abiding is as follows.

original: rnam par mi gnas pa ni rgyun mi 'dra ba nyid kyi de lta bu la rnam par mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas pa ni rgyun mi 'dra ba nyid kyi de lta bu la rnam par mi gnas pa ste /
translated: Non-abiding is a continuity that is not the same.üîΩIt is a mode that is free from a continuity that is the same or not the same as an enduring reality.

original: ther zug pa dang 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyun dang bral ba nyid kyi rnam pas so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ther zug pa dang 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyun dang bral ba nyid kyi rnam pas so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: med pa nyid kyis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: med pa nyid kyis zhes pa ste /
translated: It is non-existent.

original: de kho na nyid du zhes pa ni lhag ma ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid du zhes pa ni lhag ma ste /
translated: In reality is the remainder.

original: kun rdzob tu ni skyon med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni skyon med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that there is no fault in the conventional.

original: rab 'byor bstan bcos las /üîΩbrtags dang brjod du med ces te yum bar ma las /
analyzed: rab 'byor bstan bcos las / brtags dang brjod du med ces te yum bar ma las /
translated: Subh≈´ti, in the treatiseüîΩit says, ‚ÄúIt is inexpressible and cannot be expressed.‚Äù

original: gang yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang yang 'di lta ste /
translated: In the middle-length Mother,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa'i chos ni brdar btags pa can no zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa'i chos ni brdar btags pa can no zhes gsungs te /
translated: it says, ‚ÄúThe phenomenon called ‚Äòbodhisattva‚Äô is a conventional designation.‚Äù

original: btags pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal la sogs pa ni dmigs pa la /
analyzed: btags pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal la sogs pa ni dmigs pa la /
translated: The suffering and so on that are mere designations are observed.

original: de ni gang du yang brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de ni gang du yang brjod par mi nus te /
translated: It cannot be expressed as anything at all.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi chos kyis so zhes brjod du med pa nyid rnam pa ste /
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi chos kyis so zhes brjod du med pa nyid rnam pa ste /
translated: It is not expressed by any dharma, from the aggregates, elements, and sense bases up to the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'di la gsungs pa ni de ltar zhes pa ni ming la don med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'di la gsungs pa ni de ltar zhes pa ni ming la don med pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The statement here is ‚Äúthus‚Äù because the meaning does not exist in the name.

original: ming dang btags pa gang de zhes pa ni ming du btags pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa bden pa la'o //
analyzed: ming dang btags pa gang de zhes pa ni ming du btags pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa bden pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever is named and designated‚Äù is the designation of the name, which is in the truth of suffering and so on.

original: mi gnas pa ni de kho na nyid du rnam par mi gnas la /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ni de kho na nyid du rnam par mi gnas la /
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not abide‚Äù means it does not abide in reality.

original: mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni tha snyad du nges pa'i phyir te de ni btags pa tsam mo zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni tha snyad du nges pa'i phyir te de ni btags pa tsam mo zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not nonabiding‚Äù means it is ascertained conventionally. The meaning is that it is merely a designation.

original: rnam par mi gnas pa ni de yang brtags pa'i ngo bo las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i ngo bo mi gnas la /
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas pa ni de yang brtags pa'i ngo bo las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i ngo bo mi gnas la /
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not abide in any way‚Äù means that it does not abide in the nature of the various aggregates, elements, and so on, which are the nature of the imputed.

original: gang gi phyir des na brjod du med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des na brjod du med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: Because of that, the intended meaning is ‚Äúinexpressible.‚Äù

original: rnam par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni tham snyad kyis gang du yang brjod par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni dmigs pa dang rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni tham snyad kyis gang du yang brjod par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni dmigs pa dang rnam pa'o //
translated: Nor is it non-abiding, because it is to be expressed in any way by conventional terms.

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú If‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam par rnams kyis @39a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam par rnams kyis @39a * //
translated: ‚Äú In this way‚Äù is with the objects and aspects as explained.

original: so ; / rjod par byed pa ni gzhung la'o //
analyzed: so ; / rjod par byed pa ni gzhung la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Expresses‚Äù is in the text.

original: bstan par byed pa ni don la'o //
analyzed: bstan par byed pa ni don la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Demonstrates‚Äù is in the meaning.

original: nye bar bstan par byed pa ni don la sems pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab skyed par byed pas so //
analyzed: nye bar bstan par byed pa ni don la sems pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab skyed par byed pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Clearly demonstrates‚Äù is in the meaning, because it generates the wisdom that is the nature of reflection.

original: sems zhum par mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ni zhi gnas bskyed pa gsungs pa ste don ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sems zhum par mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ni zhi gnas bskyed pa gsungs pa ste don ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: ‚Äú The mind does not become slack‚Äù and so on explains the generation of ≈õamatha, the meaning of which is as before.

original: lhag par mos pa ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi stobs kyis nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi stobs kyis nges par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Firm conviction‚Äù is the ascertainment by the power of ≈õamatha and vipa≈õyanƒÅ.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas rtse gcig pas so //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas rtse gcig pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Single-pointed‚Äù is by the superior intention.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i zhes pa ni phyir mi ldog pa ste yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nges ba'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i zhes pa ni phyir mi ldog pa ste yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nges ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIrreversible‚Äù means irreversible, i.e., certain not to turn back from perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de ni de rnams la'o //
analyzed: de ni de rnams la'o //
translated: That is for them.

original: legs par gnas pa ni yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: legs par gnas pa ni yang dag par gnas so //
translated: ‚ÄúWell-established‚Äù means correctly established.

original: gnas pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: gnas pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúApplication without abiding‚Äù is by application without observing the three spheres.

original: rtse mo chung ngu ni /
analyzed: rtse mo chung ngu ni /
translated: The small peak is:

original: gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag gi //
analyzed: gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag gi //
translated: Not abiding in form, etc.,

original: de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med //
translated: their nature is essenceless.

original: de dag gcig gis rang bzhin gcig / ces ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gcig gis rang bzhin gcig / ces ba ste /
translated: They are the same nature.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams la mi gnas pa ni gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bos stong pa nyid ces sems pas gnas pa mi rigs pas gzugs la sogs pa ka dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams la mi gnas pa ni gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bos stong pa nyid ces sems pas gnas pa mi rigs pas gzugs la sogs pa ka dmigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot abiding in form, etc.,‚Äù is because of thinking, ‚ÄúSince they are empty of the nature of form, etc., it is not reasonable to abide in them,‚Äù one does not observe form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag phan tshun ngo bo gcig ste gzugs la sogs pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kho na gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes dbye ba dang bral ba'i ram pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag phan tshun ngo bo gcig ste gzugs la sogs pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kho na gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes dbye ba dang bral ba'i ram pa'o //
translated: Form and so on, all dharmas, and emptiness are mutually one entity. Form and so on are emptiness, and emptiness is just form and so on. Thus, they are free from differentiation.üîΩThus,

original: de ltar / de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas //
analyzed: de ltar / de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas //
translated: they do not abide as impermanent and so on.

original: de rnams de yi ngo bos stong //
analyzed: de rnams de yi ngo bos stong //
translated: They are empty of their own entity.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: Thus,

original: des gzugs la sogs pa la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams su mi gnas te /
analyzed: des gzugs la sogs pa la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams su mi gnas te /
translated: impermanence and so on do not abide in form and so on.

original: gang yang 'dir de rnams kyi rtag pa la sogs pa rnams ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid do zhes pa ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang 'dir de rnams kyi rtag pa la sogs pa rnams ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid do zhes pa ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: Whatever is permanent and so on in them is empty of its own entity as impermanent and so on. This is the object.

original: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig ces te /
analyzed: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig ces te /
translated: They are one entity.üîΩImpermanence and so on are one entity.

original: mi rtag pa'o zhes mi rtag pa dang stong pa nyid dag phan tshun ngo bo gcig ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'o zhes mi rtag pa dang stong pa nyid dag phan tshun ngo bo gcig ste /
translated: Impermanence and emptiness are mutually one entity,

original: gzugs la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid dag bzhin no zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid dag bzhin no zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
translated: like form and so on and emptiness. This is the aspect.

original: de bzhi du gzugs la sogs pa dang de'i mi rtag pa la sgos par mi gnas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das yum chen mor rgya cher gsungs la /
analyzed: de bzhi du gzugs la sogs pa dang de'i mi rtag pa la sgos par mi gnas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das yum chen mor rgya cher gsungs la /
translated: This is extensively taught in the Transcendent Lord's Great Mother.

original: de nyid 'di bsdus nas gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid 'di bsdus nas gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The same is taught in brief here, beginning with Moreover...

original: @39b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes pa ni /
analyzed: @39b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes pa ni /
translated: In the perfection of wisdom refers to

original: rtse mo chug ngu'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: rtse mo chug ngu'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: the defining characteristics of the peak of wisdom.

original: spyod pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dag gis so //
analyzed: spyod pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dag gis so //
translated: Practice refers to listening and reflection.

original: de bsgom par bya zhes pa ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gis so //
analyzed: de bsgom par bya zhes pa ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gis so //
translated: One should cultivate that refers to serenity and insight.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: Why is that?

original: gnas pa dngos por dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa ni sems pas so //
analyzed: gnas pa dngos por dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa ni sems pas so //
translated: Dwelling in the apprehension of things as real refers to the mental state.

original: de ltar gnas pa ni gang du gzugs la sogs pa la mngon par 'du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa ni gang du gzugs la sogs pa la mngon par 'du byed pa ste /
translated: Dwelling in that way refers to the non-manifestation of form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtsol ba dang bcas pa rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa ma lags zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtsol ba dang bcas pa rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa ma lags zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNot in the practice of conceptualization with effort in form and so on‚Äù is in the perfection of wisdom without conceptualization.

original: de la spyod pa gang na ma yin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags pa ni dmigs pas so //
analyzed: de la spyod pa gang na ma yin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags pa ni dmigs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot in the practice of that‚Äù is not in the apprehending of it.

original: rnal 'byor du byed pa ma lags pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba dang dngos gzhin dang rjes kyi gnas skabs rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor du byed pa ma lags pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba dang dngos gzhin dang rjes kyi gnas skabs rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot in the yoga of that‚Äù and ‚Äúnot in the completion of that‚Äù are in the stages of preparation, actual basis, and conclusion, respectively.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhes pa ni kun mkhyen pa gsum po rnams la'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhes pa ni kun mkhyen pa gsum po rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn omniscience‚Äù is in the three omnisciences.

original: yongs su mi gzung ba ni mi gzung bar rigs pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mi gzung ba ni mi gzung bar rigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot to be apprehended‚Äù is not to be apprehended as proper.

original: yongs su mi gzung zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa gang du mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su mi gzung zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa gang du mi gnas pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNot to be apprehended‚Äù is not to be apprehended in form and so on.

original: de ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: That is the object.

original: gang yang ngo bo nyid med pas gzugs la sogs pas yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs la sogs pa ma lags zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang ngo bo nyid med pas gzugs la sogs pas yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs la sogs pa ma lags zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
translated: And whatever is devoid of intrinsic reality is not form, etc. This is the aspect.

original: thams cad ces pa ni gang chos thams cad la yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni gang chos thams cad la yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de'o //
translated: All means that which is devoid of grasping with regard to all phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa rgya che bas yangs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa rgya che bas yangs pa'o //
translated: It is vast because it is focused on the vast expanse of reality.

original: mngon du byas pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par dag gi sems pas mdun du gnas pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon du byas pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par dag gi sems pas mdun du gnas pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is actualized because it is present in the mind through the specific focus and aspects as they have been explained, and because it is praised by all the buddhas.

original: tshad med pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i don du snying rje chen po'am shes rab kyi sbyor bas tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don byed par nges pa'i phyir tshad med par nges pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i don du snying rje chen po'am shes rab kyi sbyor bas tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don byed par nges pa'i phyir tshad med par nges pa'o //
translated: It is unbounded because it is certain to accomplish the aims of limitless sentient beings through the application of great compassion or wisdom for the sake of awakening.

original: thun mong ma lags pa ni dmigs pa rtogs pa la sogs pa lnga po'i khyad par rnams kyis so //
analyzed: thun mong ma lags pa ni dmigs pa rtogs pa la sogs pa lnga po'i khyad par rnams kyis so //
translated: The uncommon is the five distinctions of the realization of the object, and so forth.

original: rtse mo 'bring gi dbang du byas gnas bstan bcos su /
analyzed: rtse mo 'bring gi dbang du byas gnas bstan bcos su /
translated: The treatise teaches the stage of the medium peak:

original: chos rnams mi 'dzin gang nyid dang // de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir //üîΩzhes te / gang zhig chos @40a * //
analyzed: chos rnams mi 'dzin gang nyid dang // de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir // zhes te / gang zhig chos @40a * //
translated: Not apprehending any phenomena, not seeing their signs,

original: rnams thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni de'i dmigs pa la chos kyi mtshan ma ma mthong ba ni rnam pa ste 'dir de gsung ba ni de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩmi rtag pa la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid kyang ste mtshan ma ni chos rnams kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnams thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni de'i dmigs pa la chos kyi mtshan ma ma mthong ba ni rnam pa ste 'dir de gsung ba ni de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste / mi rtag pa la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid kyang ste mtshan ma ni chos rnams kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: Whoever does not apprehend any phenomena, that is the object of observation. Not seeing the signs of phenomena is the aspect. Here, that is stated in ‚Äúthat also‚Äù and so forth.

original: gzugs zhes pa dang tshor ba zhes pa nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: gzugs zhes pa dang tshor ba zhes pa nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: Impermanence and so forth and also emptiness are signs. Signs are the characteristics that distinguish phenomena, from ‚Äúform‚Äù and ‚Äúfeeling‚Äù up to ‚Äúbuddha qualities.‚Äù

original: bstan par byed pa gsungs pa ni gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan par byed pa gsungs pa ni gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching is stated in ‚ÄúIf‚Äù and so forth. Here, it is the teaching of the Buddha.

original: na ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: na ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: Na is for the reason.

original: phreng ba can ni mi la kun tu rgyu'i dka' thub can no //
analyzed: phreng ba can ni mi la kun tu rgyu'i dka' thub can no //
translated: The garland-holder is a wandering ascetic.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: bstan pa la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa la zhugs pa'o //
translated: One who has entered the teaching.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring la'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring la'o //
translated: The knowledge of omniscience is for the medium peak.

original: de lta bu ni byed ces pas so //
analyzed: de lta bu ni byed ces pas so //
translated: Such is the action.

original: dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa ni bstan pa'i phyogs gcig la rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa ni bstan pa'i phyogs gcig la rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One who has become a follower through faith is one who has gone forth in one part of the teaching.

original: phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring gis so //
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring gis so //
translated: With the knowledge of one part is for the medium peak.

original: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin zhes pa ni de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin zhes pa ni de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not grasping form is because one does not mentally engage in its signs.

original: dga' ba dang bde ba ni yid dang lus kyis te ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: dga' ba dang bde ba ni yid dang lus kyis te ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas so //
translated: Joy and bliss are with the mind and body, with which one possesses concentration.

original: rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa ni /
translated: The special features are stated:

original: de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: One does not see it as internal form, and so on.

original: de ngo bo nyid med pas de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de ngo bo nyid med pas de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Since it is devoid of intrinsic reality, it is not mentally engaged in its characteristics.

original: gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa ni mtshan mar yid la mi byed kyang phung po lnga po rnams kun rdzob tu snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa ni mtshan mar yid la mi byed kyang phung po lnga po rnams kun rdzob tu snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: Not seeing it otherwise means that even though it is not mentally engaged in characteristics, the five aggregates appear conventionally.

original: de ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i phung po ste lnga po la'o //
analyzed: de ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i phung po ste lnga po la'o //
translated: That is, form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are the five aggregates.

original: de la tshogs par byed cing 'dus par byed pas gzugs te /
analyzed: de la tshogs par byed cing 'dus par byed pas gzugs te /
translated: Among them, form is that which forms a collection and brings things together.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya zhes pa'i yul lnga dang bcu zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'i 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa can gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya zhes pa'i yul lnga dang bcu zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'i 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa can gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The five sense objects, which are the eye, ear, nose, tongue, and body faculties, and form, sound, smell, taste, and tactility, are the ten. They are the essence of the aggregate of form, which is composed of the elements and the derivatives of the elements.

original: de las 'byung ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la /
analyzed: de las 'byung ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la /
translated: Among them, the elements are earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: reg bya dang mig la sogs pa bcu po ni 'byung pa las gyur pa'o //
analyzed: reg bya dang mig la sogs pa bcu po ni 'byung pa las gyur pa'o //
translated: The ten such as tactile objects and the eyes are derived from the elements.

original: tshor ba'i gsum la sogs pa ni sems kyi bya ba'i ngo bo'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi sems @40b las byung ba ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i gsum la sogs pa ni sems kyi bya ba'i ngo bo'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi sems @40b las byung ba ste /
translated: The three such as feeling are mental factors that are states of the activity of mind.

original: de la tshim pa po dang yongs su gdung ba po dang btang snyoms kyi yul mngon sum du byed pa'i bya ba'i yul gyi rjes su myong ba po'i rnam par shes pa'i nyams su myong ba tshor ba zhes pas na tshor ba zhes brjod la de yang rnam
analyzed: de la tshim pa po dang yongs su gdung ba po dang btang snyoms kyi yul mngon sum du byed pa'i bya ba'i yul gyi rjes su myong ba po'i rnam par shes pa'i nyams su myong ba tshor ba zhes pas na tshor ba zhes brjod la de yang rnam
translated: Feeling is the experience of consciousness that experiences the activity of the object that manifests as the object of satisfaction, the object of complete frustration, and the object of equanimity.

original: pa gsum ste /
analyzed: pa gsum ste /
translated: It is threefold:

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin zhes pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin zhes pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //
translated: pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: mtshan ma ni yangs shing zhabs yangs shing ldir ba la sogs pa can du sems las byung ba gang gis 'dzin zhing yongs su gcod pa byed pa de ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni yangs shing zhabs yangs shing ldir ba la sogs pa can du sems las byung ba gang gis 'dzin zhing yongs su gcod pa byed pa de ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: The form of consciousness that apprehends and determines the characteristics of an object, such as its being broad, having feet, being round, etc., is called the discernment that has the nature of apprehending characteristics.

original: 'di 'du byed kyi phung po 'di rnams las logs su ston pa ni rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir dang 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir tshor ba dang 'du shes log pa shig tu phung por byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di 'du byed kyi phung po 'di rnams las logs su ston pa ni rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir dang 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir tshor ba dang 'du shes log pa shig tu phung por byas pa'o //
translated: The reason that feeling and discernment are placed separately as aggregates, even though they are included in the aggregate of formations, is that they are the roots of dispute and the causes of cyclic existence.

original: gnyis yang rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: gnyis yang rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ste /
translated: They are also the roots of dispute.

original: 'dod pa la dmigs pa dang lta ba la dmigs pas tshor ba dang 'du shes de dag go rim bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgyu'i yang gtso bo'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa la dmigs pa dang lta ba la dmigs pas tshor ba dang 'du shes de dag go rim bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgyu'i yang gtso bo'i rgyu ste /
translated: Feeling and discernment are the principal causes of cyclic existence, respectively, because they focus on desire and views.

original: tshor ba la chags shing 'du shes kyis phyin ci log pas de 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la chags shing 'du shes kyis phyin ci log pas de 'khor ba'o //
translated: One cycles in samsara through attachment to feeling and through error due to discernment.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa spangs pa'i kun rdzob pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mchog tu bde ba myong ba gcig tu mthar thug pa tshor ba'i phung po gtso bo yin pas logs su rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa spangs pa'i kun rdzob pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mchog tu bde ba myong ba gcig tu mthar thug pa tshor ba'i phung po gtso bo yin pas logs su rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn has separately established the aggregate of feeling as the most important, because the nature of the five aggregates of the relative that have abandoned obscurations is the experience of supreme nonconceptual bliss, which is the ultimate one taste.

original: 'gu shes kyi phung po ni sngon gyi gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i ngor ji lta rigs par 'du byed kyi phung po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rjesüîΩsu 'brang bas logs su rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'gu shes kyi phung po ni sngon gyi gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i ngor ji lta rigs par 'du byed kyi phung po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brang bas logs su rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of consciousness is separately established because it is the cause of the foundations of mindfulness, etc., which are included in the aggregate of formation, in accordance with the inclinations of disciples, following the previous state.

original: don dam par ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad kyis stong pa nyid la /
analyzed: don dam par ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad kyis stong pa nyid la /
translated: In the ultimate, it is empty of all elaborations, such as being different or not being different.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams ni 'khor ba dang cig shes kyis gnas skabs dag tu sgrubs shing sgrub par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams ni 'khor ba dang cig shes kyis gnas skabs dag tu sgrubs shing sgrub par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The aggregates of form, etc., are established and will be established as samsara.

original: tshor ba dang 'du shes dag gis gzhan du sems pa'i spang bya dang blang ba ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang 'du shes dag gis gzhan du sems pa'i spang bya dang blang ba ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: The aggregate of discrimination is the discrimination of what is to be abandoned and what is to be adopted in other lives through feeling and discrimination.

original: de yang gong du go skabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de yang gong du go skabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This will be explained in detail later on in the appropriate places.

original: gang du don 'dzin cing yongs su gcod pa ni rnam par shes pa @41a * //
analyzed: gang du don 'dzin cing yongs su gcod pa ni rnam par shes pa @41a * //
translated: Consciousness is that which apprehends and determines objects.

original: rtogs la de'i shes pa ni drug ste /
analyzed: rtogs la de'i shes pa ni drug ste /
translated: Its consciousness is sixfold:

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
translated: eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental consciousness.

original: de ltar mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyogs rnams dang dus rnams kyi bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i khams kyi 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdu na phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: de ltar mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyogs rnams dang dus rnams kyi bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i khams kyi 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdu na phung po lnga'o //
translated: Thus, all things that hold their own characteristics, which are beyond the enumeration of infinite and boundless directions and times, are in brief the five aggregates.

original: 'di nyid 'dir shes par gsal bar byed skyed par byed ces pa'i skye mched ni bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di nyid 'dir shes par gsal bar byed skyed par byed ces pa'i skye mched ni bcu gnyis te /
translated: The twelve sense bases are stated here in order to clarify the understanding of this.

original: dbang po'i dang yul gyi bcu dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched dang bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: dbang po'i dang yul gyi bcu dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched dang bcu gnyis so //
translated: They are the twelve sense bases, which are the ten sense bases of the faculties and objects, the mind sense base, and the phenomena sense base.

original: de la yid kyi skye mched ni bdun gyi dngos po can te /üîΩyul drug gi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: de la yid kyi skye mched ni bdun gyi dngos po can te / yul drug gi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi dbang po ste /
translated: The mind sense base has the nature of seven things.üîΩIt is the six consciousnesses of the six objects and the mind faculty.

original: de ni rnam par shes pa drug po rnams kyi nang na gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i de ma thag tu 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par shes pa drug po rnams kyi nang na gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i de ma thag tu 'das pa'o //
translated: It is the one that has just ceased among the six consciousnesses.

original: chos kyi skye mched la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni chos thams cad la dmigs shing gcig pu ma yin pa'i shes pa gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni chos thams cad la dmigs shing gcig pu ma yin pa'i shes pa gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: The Levels of Yogic Deeds says that the mental faculty focuses on all phenomena and is not shared with other minds.

original: tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du shes kyi phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po la 'dus ma byas dang bstan du med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo dang skye mched drug dang kun rdzob kyi sa bon zhes bshad do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du shes kyi phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po la 'dus ma byas dang bstan du med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo dang skye mched drug dang kun rdzob kyi sa bon zhes bshad do //
translated: It also says that the mental faculty is the basis for the aggregates of feeling, discernment, and formation; for unconditioned phenomena; for what is not visible; for what is unimpeded; and for the seeds of the conventional.

original: yid kyi skye mched rnam pa bdun du phye bas ni khams bco brgyad ces brjod do //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched rnam pa bdun du phye bas ni khams bco brgyad ces brjod do //
translated: The eighteen constituents are set forth by dividing the mental faculty into seven parts.

original: mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa nas ji srid du yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa'i bar la khams drug gi skyes bu zhes pa ni 'dir sa dang chu dang me dang
analyzed: mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa nas ji srid du yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa'i bar la khams drug gi skyes bu zhes pa ni 'dir sa dang chu dang me dang
translated: The six constituents that are the six kinds of beings are the eye constituent, form constituent, and eye-consciousness constituent, and so on up to the mental faculty constituent, phenomena constituent, and mental-consciousness constituent.

original: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams te /
analyzed: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams te /
translated: The elements of wind, space, and consciousness.

original: de la lus kyi nang gi khong stong ni nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: de la lus kyi nang gi khong stong ni nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The empty cavities within the body are the space element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.

translated: The eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.üîΩThe eight consciousnesses are the consciousness element.

original: gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas ngan len la sogs pa 'dir kun tu zhugs par byed ces pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang brgyad do //
analyzed: gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas ngan len la sogs pa 'dir kun tu zhugs par byed ces pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang brgyad do //
translated: The eight are the foundation consciousness, the six consciousnesses such as eye consciousness, and the afflicted mentality.

original: de nyid yang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu gyur nas chos gzhan rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams la sems par byas pas ji ltar rigs pa'i bag chags kyi bdag nyid kyi sa bon rgyas bar byas pa
analyzed: de nyid yang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu gyur nas chos gzhan rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams la sems par byas pas ji ltar rigs pa'i bag chags kyi bdag nyid kyi sa bon rgyas bar byas pa
translated: That very foundation consciousness, together with those other consciousnesses, thinks about other phenomena that are virtuous or nonvirtuous, and it increases the seeds that are the nature of propensities in accordance with the situation.

original: las / gang zhig rgyud yongs su sgyur ba'i khyad par byed pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin gyis dngos po las mi ldog pa thob nas bden par dus phyis de'i 'bras bu dga' ba'am mi dga' bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: las / gang zhig rgyud yongs su sgyur ba'i khyad par byed pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin gyis dngos po las mi ldog pa thob nas bden par dus phyis de'i 'bras bu dga' ba'am mi dga' bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: From that, when the transformation of the continuum is made, the power of the special transformation causes the attainment of the state of irreversibility. Later, the result of that transformation will definitely arise as a pleasant or unpleasant result.

original: dper na rgya skyegs kyi khu bas sbabs pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon gyi me tog dang 'bras bu yang dmar por skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper na rgya skyegs kyi khu bas sbabs pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon gyi me tog dang 'bras bu yang dmar por skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: For example, a cotton seed that is soaked in lac dye will produce a flower and fruit that are red.

original: 'bras bu de ru de nyid skye //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ru de nyid skye //
translated: The effect arises from that itself.

original: de nyid kyang /
analyzed: de nyid kyang /
translated: That itself is

original: mdo dgongs pa nges par 'grel bar gdul bya'i khyad par gyi ngor gsungs te /
analyzed: mdo dgongs pa nges par 'grel bar gdul bya'i khyad par gyi ngor gsungs te /
translated: taught from the perspective of the distinctions of disciples in the S≈´tra Unraveling the Intention.

original: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing shin tu phra //
analyzed: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing shin tu phra //
translated: The appropriating consciousness is profound and subtle;

original: sa bon thams cad chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
translated: all seeds fall upon it like a flowing river.

original: bdag tu rtogs par 'gyur na mi rung zhes //
analyzed: bdag tu rtogs par 'gyur na mi rung zhes //
translated: Fearing that it would be conceptualized as a self,

original: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo rnams la ngas ma bstan //
analyzed: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo rnams la ngas ma bstan //
translated: I have not taught it to the childish.

original: zhes so // de yang yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba rnams su lus su nye bar len pa'i len pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de yang yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba rnams su lus su nye bar len pa'i len pa ste /
translated: Further, in the context of linking to a new birth, it is the appropriating consciousness that appropriates a body.

original: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi 'di ni kun gyi gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang zhes pa la'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi 'di ni kun gyi gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang zhes pa la'o //
translated: This is the all-base consciousness, which is the ripening of previous karma and the seed of all consciousnesses.

original: 'di ni byis pa rnams la ni bye brag tu smra ba'i khyad par rnams la ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byis pa rnams la ni bye brag tu smra ba'i khyad par rnams la ste /
translated: This is taught to the childish, that is, to the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika.

original: sems de bdag nyid ces mngon par rlom par byed pas nyan thos kyi theg par ma bstan to //
analyzed: sems de bdag nyid ces mngon par rlom par byed pas nyan thos kyi theg par ma bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is not taught in the ≈õrƒÅvaka vehicle.

original: de nyid kyis de thos nas de la rnam par shes pa'i bdag ces shin tu brtan pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du ma gyur cig ces kyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyis de thos nas de la rnam par shes pa'i bdag ces shin tu brtan pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du ma gyur cig ces kyi /
translated: It is not that the Buddha, having taught that, thought, ‚ÄúMay those who hear it not become very conceited about the self of consciousness.‚Äù

original: gang yang 'di ltar ngar rnam par rig par smra ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i ma lus pa'i bag chags kyi gzhi la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i btags pa ni de la mi 'thadüîΩde / dmigs pa dang @42a * //
analyzed: gang yang 'di ltar ngar rnam par rig par smra ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i ma lus pa'i bag chags kyi gzhi la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i btags pa ni de la mi 'thad de / dmigs pa dang @42a * //
translated: It is not tenable to impute the name ‚ÄúƒÅlaya consciousness‚Äù to the basis of all habitual tendencies, which is devoid of the characteristics of the proponents of the theory of reflexive awareness and is not specified as to its object and aspect.

original: rnam pa rten 'brel ma yin pa ni rnam pa thams cad du yul ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa rten 'brel ma yin pa ni rnam pa thams cad du yul ma nges pa ste /
translated: That which is not a dependent arising in terms of object and aspect is, in all ways, an indeterminate object.

original: de ni rta'i rva bzhin te /
analyzed: de ni rta'i rva bzhin te /
translated: It is like the horn of a rabbit.

original: don dam par yod pa'i rang rig pa'i mngon sum dang de'i mtshan nyid ni snga nas dpyad zin pas 'dir rgya chan pos ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: don dam par yod pa'i rang rig pa'i mngon sum dang de'i mtshan nyid ni snga nas dpyad zin pas 'dir rgya chan pos ci zhig bya ste /
translated: Since the ultimate reflexive awareness and its characteristics have already been analyzed, what is the use of elaborating on it here?

original: 'di ni bdun pa dang brgyad pa dag tu phye ba'i 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kho nar rnam par bzhag go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bdun pa dang brgyad pa dag tu phye ba'i 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kho nar rnam par bzhag go zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the division into the seventh and eighth, which is established as being only of the mental consciousness.

original: dbang po drug dang yul drug dang rnam par shes pa drug dang zhes pa bco brgyad kyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i khams zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po drug dang yul drug dang rnam par shes pa drug dang zhes pa bco brgyad kyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i khams zhes pa'o //
translated: The six sense faculties, the six objects, and the six consciousnesses‚Äîthese eighteen are called the elements because they grasp their own characteristics.

original: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúhere‚Äù and so on.

original: tshig ni rtse mo las te /
analyzed: tshig ni rtse mo las te /
translated: The word is from the peak.

original: de'i rnam grangs ni rab tu phye bas te rtse mo 'bring la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rnam grangs ni rab tu phye bas te rtse mo 'bring la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Its enumeration is the division, meaning the middle peak.

original: mos pa ni mthar thug pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni mthar thug pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Interest is the non-arisen ultimate certainty.

original: 'di la thams cad du zhes pa ni mngon par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la thams cad du zhes pa ni mngon par bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúeverywhere‚Äù is the teaching.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wisdom of omniscience‚Äù is the extensive explanation.

original: chos nyid ni sngon gyi bden pa'i stobs kyis te /
analyzed: chos nyid ni sngon gyi bden pa'i stobs kyis te /
translated: The reality is by the power of the previous truth.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos la'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos la'o //
translated: It is in the perfection of wisdom Dharma.

original: yongs su gzung ba ni nang gi sgro btags pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba ni nang gi sgro btags pa'o //
translated: The complete grasping is the internal reification.

original: ma dmigs pa ni dngos por nye bar mthong bas so //
analyzed: ma dmigs pa ni dngos por nye bar mthong bas so //
translated: The non-apprehension is due to the perception of substantiality.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni thams cad kyi mchog go //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni thams cad kyi mchog go //
translated: Nirvana is the highest of all.

original: de la yang rlom sems su mi byed pa ni dngos po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de la yang rlom sems su mi byed pa ni dngos po nyid kyis so //
translated: And the non-imagination of that is due to substantiality.

original: 'di ni mu stegs kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas /
analyzed: 'di ni mu stegs kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas /
translated: This is the arising from the tirthika samadhi.

original: mos pa'i stobs kyis de nyid kyi phyir btang ba dbang po nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mos pa'i stobs kyis de nyid kyi phyir btang ba dbang po nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By the power of aspiration, he is aware of the faculties themselves.

original: 'di yang ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di yang ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la yang ngo //
translated: This is also in the following explanation.

original: gang gis ni gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa can du sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis ni gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa can du sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By which, for what reason, there is no superimposition of form, etc.

original: de'i nang gi sgro 'dogs pa thams cad 'gags pas rim gyis nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i nang gi sgro 'dogs pa thams cad 'gags pas rim gyis nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Since all internal superimpositions are stopped, he does not enter nirvana gradually like the sravakas.üîΩIt is said:

original: bar ma do min zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma do min zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Not in the interval, etc.

original: rtse mo'i rab ni bstan bcos las //
analyzed: rtse mo'i rab ni bstan bcos las //
translated: The peak is taught in the treatise.

original: yongs su brtags pa'i shes rab kyis //
analyzed: yongs su brtags pa'i shes rab kyis //
translated: By the wisdom of thorough examination,

original: thams cad rjes su mi dmigs nyid /
analyzed: thams cad rjes su mi dmigs nyid /
translated: one does not observe anything at all.

original: ces te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su brtags pa ni 'dir dmigs pa la thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ces te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su brtags pa ni 'dir dmigs pa la thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa'o //
translated: The thorough examination of the perfection of wisdom here is the objective support. Not observing anything at all is the aspect.

original: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With regard to that, it is said, ‚ÄúMoreover, Subh≈´ti,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di gang 'di gang gi zhes tshol ba ni spyi'i tshol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di gang 'di gang gi zhes tshol ba ni spyi'i tshol ba'o //
translated: The search for what and whose is the search for the general.

original: ci zhes pa la sogs pa ni khyad par @42b gyis so //
analyzed: ci zhes pa la sogs pa ni khyad par @42b gyis so //
translated: What, and so on, is the search for the specific.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa ni don gyi rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa ni don gyi rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom that realizes the meaning.

original: nye bar brtags pa ni med par byed pa la mi dmigs par byed pas zhes pa ni rnam par brtags na'o //
analyzed: nye bar brtags pa ni med par byed pa la mi dmigs par byed pas zhes pa ni rnam par brtags na'o //
translated: Thorough examination is the nonobservation of the nonexistence of the object of examination.

original: nye bar dmigs pa ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
translated: Thorough observation is the ascertainment of one extreme.

original: mi 'gong zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems med ces pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'gong zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems med ces pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should connect ‚Äúnot discouraged‚Äù and so on with ‚Äúwithout mind.‚Äù

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: bzod pa chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: bzod pa chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
translated: With regard to the small patience, the treatise states:

original: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
analyzed: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
translated: The nature of form and so forth is essenceless.

original: de med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of its absence is also essenceless.

original: ces te / gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med ces pa ni dmigs pa ste kun rdzob kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: ces te / gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med ces pa ni dmigs pa ste kun rdzob kyi sgo nas so //
translated: Form and so forth are devoid of the nature of form and so forth. All phenomena are said to be essenceless in terms of the object of observation, that is, the conventional.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gzugs la sogs pa zhes pa ni rnam pa ste don dam pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gzugs la sogs pa zhes pa ni rnam pa ste don dam pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The nature of its absence is also essenceless. The nature of the nonexistence of the entity of form and so forth is said to be the aspect in terms of the ultimate.

original: de la gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de la gsungs pa ni /
translated: With regard to that, the text states:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva

original: gzugs la sogs pa gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas zhes pa ni dmigs pa la /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas zhes pa ni dmigs pa la /
translated: Form and so forth are devoid of the nature of form and so forth is the object of observation.

original: ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba zhes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no zhes pa ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba zhes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no zhes pa ni rnam pa ste /
translated: The nature of the nature of form, etc., is the nature of the absence of the nature of form, etc.

original: gang du yang mtshan nyid cung zad med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang du yang mtshan nyid cung zad med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that there is not even the slightest characteristic anywhere.

original: bzod pa 'bring ni bstan bcos las //
analyzed: bzod pa 'bring ni bstan bcos las //
translated: The medium acceptance is taught in the treatise:

original: de la skye med nges 'byung med //
analyzed: de la skye med nges 'byung med //
translated: There is no arising, no emergence,

original: dag dang zhes te /
analyzed: dag dang zhes te /
translated: and purity, etc.

original: de gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de gsungs pa ni /
translated: The teaching on that is:

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad la skye ba med pa dang nges pa 'byung ba med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /
analyzed: thams cad la skye ba med pa dang nges pa 'byung ba med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /
translated: The object of that is the non-arising and non-emergence of all.

original: de thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: de thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspect is the bodhisattva's completely pure body, speech, and mind that causes that to be heard.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from the misdeeds of body, speech, and mind.

original: gnas na gnas shing gsal la rdzogs pa ni mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gnas na gnas shing gsal la rdzogs pa ni mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The sign is the complete clarity and purity while abiding in that.

original: sems can dang snod dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dang snod dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of sentient beings and the purity of the world are the complete purity of the Buddha-land.

original: chen po'i bstan bcos las /
analyzed: chen po'i bstan bcos las /
translated: The Mahayana-sastra says:

original: de yi mtshan nyid med /
analyzed: de yi mtshan nyid med /
translated: It has no characteristics.

original: de yi mtshan mar mi rten pas //
analyzed: de yi mtshan mar mi rten pas //
translated: It does not rely on characteristics.

original: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
analyzed: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
translated: It is not belief, nor is it perception.

original: zhes te / gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan mas dben pa nyid ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /üîΩgzugs la sogs @43a * //
analyzed: zhes te / gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan mas dben pa nyid ni 'di'i dmigs pa la / gzugs la sogs @43a * //
translated: The objective reference of this is the emptiness of the characteristics of form, etc.üîΩThe characteristics of form, etc.

original: pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang gzugs la sogs pa /
analyzed: pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang gzugs la sogs pa /
translated: are the characteristics of form, etc.

original: zhes pa gang la gnas pa dang mos pa'i 'du shes de rnams las ldog pa ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa gang la gnas pa dang mos pa'i 'du shes de rnams las ldog pa ni rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspects are the reversals of the perceptions of those who dwell in and believe in the characteristics of form, etc.

original: de la mos pa brtan por gyur pa ni mi gnas pa la nges pa ni mos pa la'o //
analyzed: de la mos pa brtan por gyur pa ni mi gnas pa la nges pa ni mos pa la'o //
translated: The firm belief in this is the non-dwelling. The certainty is the belief.

original: tha snyad ni 'du shes te /
analyzed: tha snyad ni 'du shes te /
translated: The conventional is the perception.

original: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The text says, ‚ÄúFurthermore, etc.

original: 'gag pa ni skad cig mas 'jig pa la 'jig pa ni rgyun gyis so //üîΩyod dang so sor 'gag pa yi //
analyzed: 'gag pa ni skad cig mas 'jig pa la 'jig pa ni rgyun gyis so // yod dang so sor 'gag pa yi //
translated: The cessation is the moment-by-moment destruction. The destruction is the continuity.üîΩThe things that exist and cease individually

original: dngos po lhan cig gyur pa yang //
analyzed: dngos po lhan cig gyur pa yang //
translated: and those that arise together

original: so sor bkag pa de dag nyid //
analyzed: so sor bkag pa de dag nyid //

original: rnam pa thams cad shes pa min //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad shes pa min //

original: zhes so // mtshan ma'i spyod pa dgag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // mtshan ma'i spyod pa dgag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yod pa ste /
translated: The practice of the perfection of wisdom exists through the prohibition of the practice of signs.

original: mtshan ma'i spyod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / gzugs la sogs pa la brten pa dang / mos pa dang 'du shes pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: mtshan ma'i spyod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / gzugs la sogs pa la brten pa dang / mos pa dang 'du shes pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: The practice of signs is characterized by the signs of form and so on, the basis of form and so on, and the conception of belief.

original: de'i stobs kyi rnam pa yang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyi rnam pa yang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The power of that is also stated:

original: de yang spyod ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang spyod ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is also stated by ‚Äúpractice‚Äù and so on.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ni rlom sems med pa rnam pa brgyad bstan pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ni rlom sems med pa rnam pa brgyad bstan pa ste /
translated: The practice of the perfection of wisdom is the teaching of the eight types of nonconceit.

original: min zhes pa ni mi 'dzin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: min zhes pa ni mi 'dzin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúNot‚Äù means not apprehending.

original: de ltar bzod pa thob pas las la dbang du gyur pas ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing rtag par rdzus te skye ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bzod pa thob pas las la dbang du gyur pas ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing rtag par rdzus te skye ba yin no //
translated: Thus, one who has attained patience becomes powerful with regard to karma, does not go to lower rebirths, and is always miraculously born.

original: chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The small supreme mundane quality is stated in the treatise:

original: ting nge 'dzin de'i byed pa ni //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de'i byed pa ni //
translated: The function of that samadhi is

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: as follows.

original: chos thams cad len pa med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /üîΩde'i byed pa ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad len pa med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la / de'i byed pa ni rnam pa ste /
translated: The object of this is the non-appropriation of all dharmas.üîΩIts function is the aspect.

original: de'i byed pa ni 'dir byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de'i byed pa ni 'dir byed pa po'o //

original: de las gsungs pa de ni ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las gsungs pa de ni ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: phyir ni gtan tshigs so //üîΩnye bar ma gtogs zhes pa ni bstan pa la bshad pa ni /
analyzed: phyir ni gtan tshigs so // nye bar ma gtogs zhes pa ni bstan pa la bshad pa ni /

original: nye bar ma zin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar ma zin zhes pa ste /

original: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /

original: gang du chos rnams thams cad yod pa min pa nye bar bzung nas gang du de ltar gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gang du chos rnams thams cad yod pa min pa nye bar bzung nas gang du de ltar gsungs pa ni /

analyzed: 'di'i dmigs pa la 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //

original: 'breng ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'breng ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The connection is in the treatise:

original: lung bstan pa dang rlom pa zad //
analyzed: lung bstan pa dang rlom pa zad //

original: ces pa ste gang zhig ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa la @43b sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa de ni dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ste gang zhig ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa la @43b sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa de ni dmigs pa ste /

original: lung ston par byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i rgyu nyid dam /
analyzed: lung ston par byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i rgyu nyid dam /
translated: The object is that which is prophesied, or the cause of the prophecy,

original: khyad par gyi gzugs la dmigs zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par gyi gzugs la dmigs zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: gang zhig ni ting nge 'dzin de'i rlom pa zad pa de ni rnam pa ste /

original: de la gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement about that is ‚Äúthrough the power of the Buddha, etc.‚Äù

original: des kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: des kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //

original: de lta bu de la zhes pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rlom pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu de la zhes pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rlom pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch a one‚Äù is one who is without the conceit explained above.

original: thams cad nas zhes pa ni chos thams cad len pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis so //
analyzed: thams cad nas zhes pa ni chos thams cad len pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù is by means of the special meditative concentrations called ‚Äúwithout grasping of all things‚Äù and so on.

original: thams cad ces pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù means complete.

original: thams cad kyi chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bye brag gis kyang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad kyi chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bye brag gis kyang ngo //

original: thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa las brtsams nas dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa las brtsams nas dus thams cad du'o //
translated: All means at all times, beginning with the attainment of meditative concentration.

original: chen po ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: chen po ni bstan bcos las /
translated: Great means as stated in the treatise:

original: gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig /üîΩting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pas //
analyzed: gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig / ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pas //
translated: The three are mutually identical in essence,

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: Meditative concentration is non-conceptual.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni gsum la de'i phan tshun gyi ngo bo ni 'di'i dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni gsum la de'i phan tshun gyi ngo bo ni 'di'i dmigs pa ste /
